skills.name: Bash
description: Bash the enemy with your weapon, dealing {value1} damage. After bashing enemies 4 times, your next Bash will clobber, Stunning enemies for 1.5 seconds. Clobber twice as often while using a Two-Handed weapon.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Clobbering an enemy grants you 20% Maximum Life as Fortify.

runes.name: Battle
description: Clobbering an enemy generates an additional 10 Fury.

runes.name: Combat
description: After Critically Striking 4 times with Bash using a Two-Handed weapon, your next Core or Weapon Mastery Skill will Overpower.

skills.name: Flay
description: Flay the enemy, dealing {value1} damage and inflicting {value2} Bleeding damage over 5 seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Flay has a 50% chance to make the enemy Vulnerable for 5 seconds. Double this chance when using a Two-Handed weapon.

runes.name: Battle
description: When Flay deals direct damage to an enemy, they take x15% increased Bleeding damage from you for the next 3 seconds.

runes.name: Combat
description: When Flay deals direct damage to an enemy, you gain 4% Damage Reduction and [X] Thorns for 6 seconds. This stacks up to 5 times.

skills.name: Frenzy
description: Unleash a rapid flurry of blows, dealing {value1} damage with each pair of hits.
If Frenzy hits an enemy, its Attack Speed is increased by +20% for 3 seconds, up to +60%.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: While Frenzy is granting +60% bonus Attack Speed, the Fury costs of your Core Skills are reduced by 25%.

runes.name: Battle
description: While Berserking, your other skills gain +6% Attack Speed for each stack of Frenzy you have.

runes.name: Combat
description: You gain 5% Damage Reduction and 5% Movement Speed per stack of Frenzy you currently have.

skills.name: Lunging Strike
description: Lunge forward and strike an enemy for {value1} damage.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Lunging Strike deals x30% increased damage and Heals you for 2% Maximum Life when it damages a Healthy enemy.

runes.name: Battle
description: Lunging Strike also inflicts 40% Bleeding damage over 5 seconds.

runes.name: Combat
description: Critical Strikes with Lunging Strike grant you Berserking for 3 seconds.

skills.name: Double Swing
description: Sweep your weapons from opposite directions, dealing {value1} damage with each weapon. Enemies caught in the center are damaged by both.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Hitting an enemy with both hits of Double Swing makes them Vulnerable for 2 seconds.

runes.name: Violent
description: If Double Swing damages a Stunned or Knocked Down enemy, gain 25 Fury.

runes.name: Furious
description: Casting Double Swing while Berserking grants 2 additional seconds of Berserking.

skills.name: Hammer of the Ancients
description: Slam your hammer down with the fury of the Ancients, dealing {value1} damage to a concentrated area.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Gain x5% more Fury for 5 seconds for each enemy damaged by Hammer of the Ancients, stacking up to 10 times.

runes.name: Violent
description: After Overpowering with Hammer of the Ancients, you deal x40% more damage for 5 seconds.

runes.name: Furious
description: Hammer of the Ancients gain 5% Critical Strike Damage and Critical Strike Chance for every 10 Fury you had when cast. Its Critical Strikes Knockdown enemies for 2 seconds.

skills.name: Rend
description: Cleave enemies in front of you, dealing {value1} damage and inflicting {value2} Bleeding damage over 5 seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Dealing direct damage with Rend extends the duration of Vulnerable on enemies by 2 seconds.

runes.name: Violent
description: Rend deals x30% increased damage to Vulnerable enemies.

runes.name: Furious
description: Direct damage with Rend grants 5 Fury per enemy hit, up to a maximum of 25 Fury.

skills.name: Upheaval
description: Tear into the ground with your weapon and fling debris forward, dealing {value1} damage.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Upheaval has a 45% chance to Stun all enemies it damages for 3 seconds.

runes.name: Violent
description: If Upheaval damages at least 2 enemies or a Boss, you gain Berserking for 3 seconds, increased to 5 seconds if it damages at least 4 enemies.

runes.name: Furious
description: Dealing direct damage to an enemy with a Skill that is not Upheaval causes your next cast of Upheaval to deal x20% increased damage, stacking up to 10 times.

skills.name: Whirlwind
description: Rapidly attack surrounding enemies for {value1} damage.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Gain 1 Fury each time Whirlwind deals direct damage to an enemy, or 4 Fury against Elite enemies.

runes.name: Violent
description: Channeling Whirlwind for 2 seconds increases the damage of your next Weapon Mastery Skill by 35% if used immediately after Whirlwind ends.

runes.name: Furious
description: While using a Slashing weapon, Whirlwind also inflicts 120% Weapon Damage as Bleeding damage over 5 seconds.

skills.name: Challenging Shout
description: Taunt Nearby enemies and gain {value1} Damage Reduction for 6 seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: While Challenging Shout is active, gain x20% bonus Maximum Life.

runes.name: Tactical
description: While Challenging Shout is active, you gain 6 Fury each time you take damage.

runes.name: Strategic
description: While Challenging Shout is active, gain Thorns equal to 30% of your Maximum Life.

skills.name: Ground Stomp
description: Smash the ground, dealing {value2} damage and Stunning surrounding enemies for 3 seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Ground Stomp generates 60 Fury and has a 2 second increased Stun duration.

runes.name: Tactical
description: Ground Stomp is now a Brawling Skill and deals x100% increased damage. It also applies Vulnerable for 4 seconds.

runes.name: Strategic
description: Reduce the Cooldown of your Ultimate Skill by 5 seconds per enemy damaged by Ground Stomp, up to 15 seconds.

skills.name: Iron Skin
description: Steel yourself, gaining a Barrier that absorbs {value1} of your missing Life for 5 seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Iron Skin grants Unhindered for 5 seconds and its Barrier absorbs 30% more of your Maximum Life.

runes.name: Tactical
description: While Iron Skin is active, Heal for 20% of the Barrier's original amount as Life per second.

runes.name: Strategic
description: Iron Skin also grants 30% Maximum Life as Fortify. Double this amount if cast while below 50% Life.

skills.name: Rallying Cry
description: Bellow a rallying cry, increasing your Movement Speed by +30% and Resource Generation by x {value1} for 6 seconds, and Nearby allies for 3 seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Rallying Cry grants you Unstoppable while active.

runes.name: Tactical
description: Rallying Cry generates 20 Fury and grants you an additional x20% Resource Generation.

runes.name: Strategic
description: Rallying Cry grants you 10% Maximum Life as Fortify. While Rallying Cry is active, you gain an additional 2% Maximum Life as Fortify each time you take or deal direct damage.

skills.name: Charge
description: Become Unstoppable and rush forward, pushing enemies with you and then swinging through them dealing {value2} damage and Knocking them Back.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Enemies who are Knocked Back into terrain by Charge take 150% damage and are Stunned for 3 seconds.

runes.name: Mighty
description: Damaging enemies with Charge makes them Vulnerable for 4 seconds.

runes.name: Power
description: Reduce Charge's Cooldown by 2 seconds for each enemy it hits, up to 6 seconds. Charging a boss reduces the Cooldown by 6 seconds.

skills.name: Kick
description: Throw a powerful kick that deals {value2} damage and Knocks Back enemies in front of you. Enemies who are Knocked Back into terrain take an additional 105% damage and are Stunned for 3 seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Damaging enemies with Kick reduces the cooldown of your Mobility Skills by 5 seconds per enemy, and also makes them Vulnerable for 4 seconds.

runes.name: Mighty
description: Kicked enemies deal 54% damage to enemies they collide with while being Knocked Back. Enemies damaged this way are Knocked Down for 4 seconds.

runes.name: Power
description: Kick is now also a Core Skill. If Kick damages an enemy, it consumes all of your Fury and deals an additional 25% damage per 10 Fury spent. Kick no longer Knocks Back enemies.

skills.name: Leap
description: Leap forward and then slam down, dealing {value2} damage and slowing surrounding enemies by 70% for 5 seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: If Leap doesn't damage any enemies, its Cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds.

runes.name: Mighty
description: Leap deals x40% increased damage and surrounding enemies are Knocked Back on impact.

runes.name: Power
description: If Leap damages at least one enemy, gain 40 Fury.

skills.name: War Cry
description: Bellow a mighty war cry, increasing your damage dealt by x {value1} for 6 seconds, and Nearby allies for 3 seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: War Cry grants you Berserking for 4 seconds.

runes.name: Mighty
description: War Cry grants you 15% Maximum Life as Fortify.

runes.name: Power
description: If at least 6 enemies are Nearby when you cast War Cry, your damage bonus is increased by an additional x10%.

skills.name: Death Blow
description: Attempt a killing strike, dealing {value1} damage to enemies in front of you.
If this kills an enemy, its Cooldown is reset.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Death Blow deals x200% increased damage to Bosses.

runes.name: Warrior's
description: If Death Blow damages at least one enemy, gain Berserking for 3 seconds.

runes.name: Fighter's
description: If Death Blow damages at least one enemy, gain 20 Fury.

skills.name: Rupture
description: Skewer enemies in front of you, dealing 25% damage which is guaranteed to Overpower. Then rip your weapon out, damaging enemies for their total Bleeding amount and removing all Bleeding damage from them.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Ripping your weapon out of enemies during Rupture causes an explosion that deals 70% Bleeding damage over 5 seconds. This damage is increased by x35% for each 50 Strength you have.

runes.name: Warrior's
description: Hitting enemies with Rupture increases your Attack Speed by +40% for 5 seconds.

runes.name: Fighter's
description: Hitting at least 1 enemy with Rupture Heals you for 22% of your Maximum Life.

skills.name: Steel Grasp
description: Thow out a trio of chains that deal {value2} damage and Pull In enemies.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Steel Grasp also makes enemies Vulnerable for 3 seconds.

runes.name: Warrior's
description: Steel Grasp gains 2 additional Charge.

runes.name: Fighter's
description: Steel Grasp's damage is increased by x200% and if it damages an enemy you gain Berserking for 2 seconds.

skills.name: Mighty Throw
description: Hurl your weapon, dealing {value1} damage upon impact and sticking in the ground. While in the ground, your weapon pulses and deals {value2} damage every second for 4 seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Mighty Throw grants 25% increased Attack Speed for 6 seconds.

runes.name: Warrior's
description: Mighty Throw's impact deals x50% increased damage and Stuns enemies for 2 seconds.

runes.name: Fighter's
description: Swapping weapons near any of your thrown weapons creates an additional pulse. Mighty Throw generates 20% of your Maximum Life as a Barrier for 6 seconds.

skills.name: Call of the Ancients
description: Call upon 3 Ancients to aid you in battle for 6 seconds.
description_list: Korlic leaps at enemies, dealing {value1} damage and swings his weapons in a frenzy, dealing {value2} damage per hit.
Talic spins in a whirlwind rapidly attacking enemies for {value3} damage.
Madawc upheaves the ground, dealing {value4} damage.
description2: Rank 5: While Call of the Ancients is active, gain +40% Movement Speed and 20% Distant Damage Reduction.

runes.name: Prime
description: While Call of the Ancients is active, gain +20% bonus Attack Speed and x30% increased damage.

runes.name: Supreme
description: Each of the Ancients gains additional power:
Korlic: You gain 10 Fury each time Korlic damages an enemy with his Frenzy.
Talic: Enemies are Slowed by 50% for 1 second when damaged by his Whirlwind.
Madawc: 30% chance to Stun enemies for 3 seconds when using his Upheaval.

skills.name: Iron Maelstrom
description: Activate three times to attach chains to each of your weapons and perform an attack:
description_list: First your Two-Handed Bludgeoning weapon slams into the ground, dealing {value1} damage and Stunning enemies for 2 seconds.
Next, your Two-Handed Slashing weapon swiped in front of you, dealing {value2} damage and inflicting {value3} Bleeding damage over 5 seconds.
Finally, your Dual Wield weapons swing around you, dealing {value4} damage per hit.
description2: Rank 5: Iron Maelstrom damage is increased by x60% of your Damage to Injured and Healthy bonuses, up to 200%.
extra: Requires a Full Arsenal of weapons

runes.name: Prime
description: Iron Maelstrom gains +30% increased Critical Strike Chance and deals x50% increased Critical Strike Damage

runes.name: Supreme
description: Swapping weapons reduces Iron Maelstrom's Cooldown by 1 second.

skills.name: Wrath of the Berserker
description: Explode into rage, Knocking Back surrounding enemies and gaining Berserking and Unstoppable for 10 seconds.
Rank 5: Wrath of the Berserker Pulls In surrounding enemies instead of Knocking Back and deals 500% damage to them.

runes.name: Prime
description: While Wrath of the Berserker is active, gain +20% increased Movement Speed and increase Fury Generation by x30%.

runes.name: Supreme
description: While Wrath of the Berserker is active, every 50 Fury you spend increases Berserking's damage bonus by x25%, up to x100%.

skills.name: Aggressive Resistance
description: Gain {value1} Damage Reduction while Berserking.

skills.name: Battle Fervor
description: When a Brawling Skill damages at least one enemy, gain Berserking for {value1} seconds.

skills.name: Booming Voice
description: Your Shout Skill effect durations are increased by x {value1} .

skills.name: Brute Force
description: Your Overpowers deal x {value1} increased damage when using a Two-Handed weapon.

skills.name: Concussion
description: Lucky Hit: Skills using Bludgeoning Weapons have up to a 20% chance to Stun enemies for 2 seconds, or up to a 30% chance when using a Two-Handed Bludgeoning Weapon. This also deals {value1} Physical damage to them.

skills.name: Counteroffensive
description: While you have Fortify for over 50% of your Maximum Life, you deal x {value1} increased damage.

skills.name: Cut to the Bone
description: Your Bleeding effects deal x {value1} increased damage to Vulnerable enemies.

skills.name: Defensive Stance
description: While Fortified, you gain an additional {value1} Damage Reduction and Heal 0.5% Maximum Life every second.

skills.name: Duelist
description: Attack Speed is increased by + {value1} while using One-Handed weapons.

skills.name: Endless Fury
description: Basic Skills generate x {value1} more Fury.

skills.name: Expose Vulnerability
description: Dealing direct damage with a Weapon Mastery skill causes your next Core Skill to make enemies Vulnerable for {value1} second.

skills.name: Furious Impulse
description: Each time you swap weapons, gain {value1} Fury.

skills.name: Gushing Wounds
description: When causing an enemy to Bleed, you have a chance equal to your Critical Strike Chance to increase the Bleed amount by x70%, and also increased by +100% of your Critical Strike Damage bonus.
Overpowering a Bleeding enemy creates an explosion that inflicts 150% Bleeding damage over 5 seconds.

skills.name: Guttural Yell
description: Your Shout Skills cause enemies to deal {value1} less damage for 5 seconds.

skills.name: Hamstring
description: The first time you apply a Bleeding effect to an enemy, Slow them by 70% for {value1} seconds.

skills.name: Heavy Handed
description: While using Two-Handed weapons you deal x {value1} increased Critical Strike Damage.

skills.name: Imposing Presence
description: Gain x {value1} additional Maximum Life.

skills.name: Invigorating Fury
description: Heal for {value1} of your Maximum Life for each 100 Fury spent.

skills.name: Martial Vigor
description: Damage Reduction against Elites is increased by {value1} .

skills.name: No Mercy
description: You gain + {value1} increased Critical Strike Chance.

skills.name: Outburst
description: Gain [X] Thorns. Also gain [X] Thorns for each 20 bonus Maximum Life you have.

skills.name: Pit Fighter
description: You deal x {value1} increased damage to Close enemies and gain {value2} Damage Reduction.

skills.name: Pressure Point
description: Lucky Hit: Your Core and Weapon Mastery skills have up to a {value1} chance to make enemies Vulnerable for 2 seconds.

skills.name: Prolific Fury
description: While Berserking, Fury Generation is increased by x {value1} .

skills.name: Quick Impulses
description: Reduce the duration of Control Impairing Effects by {value1} .

skills.name: Raid Leader
description: Your Shouts also Heal allies for {value1} of their Maximum Life per second.

skills.name: Slaying Strike
description: You deal {value1} increased damage to Injured and Healthy enemies.

skills.name: Swiftness
description: Movement Speed is increased by + {value1} .

skills.name: Tempered Fury
description: Increase your Maximum Fury by {value1} .

skills.name: Thick Skin
description: Each time you take direct damage gain {value1} Maximum Life as Fortify.

skills.name: Tough as Nails
description: Increase your Thorns by + {value1} . When enemies hit you, they take an additional 15% of your Thorns as Bleeding damage over 5 seconds.

skills.name: Unbridled Rage
description: Your Core Skills deal 50% increased damage but cost 100% more Fury. The damage is doubled against Injured enemies.

skills.name: Unconstrained
description: Berserking's damage bonus is increased to x60%. While not Healthy, you are always Berserk and gain a x30% Physical Damage Reduction bonus.

skills.name: Walking Arsenal
description: Casting a Skill with a Two-Handed Bludgeoning, Two-Handed Slashing, or Dual-Wielded weapon grants x15% increased damage for 15 seconds. While all three bonuses are active, you gain Unstoppable and +45% Attack Speed.

skills.name: Wallop
description: Your Skills using Bludgeoning weapons deal x {value1} increased damage if the enemy is Stunned or Vulnerable.

skills.name: Barbed Carapace
description: For every 25 Fury you spend, you gain +10% Thorns for 8 seconds, up to 120%.
Casting a Skill with a Cooldown grants you Unhindered for 5 seconds. During this time, you deal 120% of your Thorns as Physical damage to Close enemies every second.

skills.name: Heavy Hitter
description: Your Ultimate Skills, Earthquakes, and Dust Devils deal {value1} more damage.

skills.name: Irrepressible
description: Casting a Weapon Mastery Skill Fortifies you for {value1} of your Maximum Life.

skills.name: Belligerence
description: Damaging an enemy with a Basic Skill increases your damage by x {value1} for 4 seconds.

skills.name: Warpath
description: After Overpowering, you deal x {value1} increased damage for 4 seconds.

skills.name: Claw
description: Shapeshift into a Werewolf and claw at an enemy for {value1} damage.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Claw's Attack Speed is increased by +20%.

runes.name: Fierce
description: Claw applies 40% Poisoning damage over 6 seconds.

runes.name: Wild
description: Claw has a 15% chance to attack twice.

skills.name: Earth Spike
description: Sunder the earth, impaling the first enemy hit for {value1} damage.

description: Earth Spike has a 15% chance to Stun for 2.5 seconds.

runes.name: Fierce
description: Fortify for 12% of your Maximum Life whenever Earth Spike damages enemies who are Stunned, Immobilized, or Knocked Back.

runes.name: Wild
description: Summon a second Earth Spike when hitting an Immobilized or Stunned enemy.

skills.name: Maul
description: Shapeshift into a Werebear and maul enemies in front of you, dealing {value1} damage.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: If an enemy is hit by Maul, then Fortify for 8% of your Maximum Life.

runes.name: Fierce

runes.name: Wild

skills.name: Storm Strike

runes.name: Enhanced

runes.name: Fierce

runes.name: Wild

skills.name: Wind Shear
description: Conjure a piercing blade of wind, dealing {value1} damage.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Wind Shear has a 20% chance to make enemies Vulnerable for 4 seconds.

runes.name: Fierce
description: Each enemy hit by Wind Shear increases your Movement Speed by +5% for 5 seconds, up to +20%.

runes.name: Wild

skills.name: Landslide
description: Crush enemies between 4 pillars of earth, dealing up to {value1} damage.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: After Landslide damages enemies 4 times, the next hit will Immobilize enemies for 3 seconds.

runes.name: Raging
description: When you strike an Immobilized or Stunned enemy with Landslide, an additional pillar of earth is formed.

runes.name: Primal
description:
When you Immobilize or Stun an enemy, you gain a Terramote. Each enemy hit by Landslide consumes a Terramote causing a guaranteed Critical Strike with x40% increased Critical Strike Damage. Bosses always have up to a 10% chance to grant a Terramote
when hit.

skills.name: Lightning Storm
description: Conjure a growing lightning storm that deals {value1} damage per strike. The number of strikes increase the longer the storm is channeled up to a maximum of 5 at once.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: The size of your Lightning Storm is preserved for 6 seconds after channeling.

runes.name: Raging
description: Lightning Storm gains 1 additional lightning strike.

runes.name: Primal
description: Lightning Storm has a 12% chance to Immobilize enemies hit for 3 seconds.

skills.name: Pulverize
description: Shapeshift into a Werebear and slam the ground, dealing {value1} damage to surrounding enemies.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Pulverize deals x30% increased damage to Crowd Controlled enemies and Bosses.

runes.name: Raging
description: Every 10 seconds, Pulverize is guaranteed to Overpower and make enemies take x20% more damage for 5 seconds.

runes.name: Primal
description: Enemies hit with Pulverize deal 20% reduced damage for 5 seconds.

skills.name: Shred
description: Shapeshift into a Werewolf and perform a trio of combo attacks:
description_list: 1st Attack: Dash towards the target and deal {value1} damage.
3rd Attack: Perform a larger finishing move dealing {value3} damage.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Shred gains +30% Attack Speed and Heals for 4% of your Maximum Life if an enemy is struck.

runes.name: Raging
description: Shred's third combo attack is larger, applies an additional 143% Poisoning damage over 5 seconds, and causes enemies to take x150% increased Poisoning damage for 5 seconds.

runes.name: Primal

skills.name: Stone Burst
description: Gather stones beneath your enemies then detonate them dealing {value1} damage.
Channeling deals 20% damage and increases the size of the affected area, up to a 400% increase after 01.0 seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Stone Burst's final explosion damage is increased by x25% within the initial radius.

runes.name: Raging
description: Stone Burst costs x66% more Spirit, and its final explosion deals x50% more damage.

runes.name: Primal
description: While Channeling Stone Burst, and for 2 seconds after it ends, gain +30% Attack Speed.

skills.name: Tornado
description: Conjure a swirling tornado that deals {value1} damage.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Each time you cast Tornado, you have a 30% chance to spawn an additional Tornado.

runes.name: Raging
description: Extend the lifetime of Tornado by 2 seconds. Additionally, hitting a Vulnerable enemy extends the duration further by 0.5 seconds up to a maximum of 3 seconds.

runes.name: Primal
description: Enemies hit by Tornado are Slowed by 60%

skills.name: Blood Howl
description: Shapeshift into a Werewolf and howl furiously, Healing you for {value1} of your Maximum Life.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Killing enemies reduce the Cooldown of Blood Howl by 1 second and hitting a Boss reduces its Cooldown by 0.3 seconds

runes.name: Innate
description: Blood Howl also generates 20 Spirit. You deal x25% increased damage until you shapeshift out of Werewolf form.

runes.name: Preserving
description: Blood Howl also increases your Attack Speed by +15% for 4 seconds.

skills.name: Cyclone Armor
description: Passive: Powerful winds surround you, granting {value1} Non-Physical Damage Reduction.
Active: The winds rapidly expand, Knocking Back enemies and dealing {value2} damage.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Enemies Knocked Back by Cyclone Armor become Vulnerable for 5 seconds.

runes.name: Innate
description: Enemies who are hit by Cyclone Armor are Slowed by 70% and take x15% increased damage for 6 seconds.

runes.name: Preserving
description: Cyclone Armor now Pulls In enemies rather than Knocking Back and grants 10% Damage Reduction for 4 seconds.

skills.name: Debilitating Roar
description: Shapeshift into a Werebear and bellow a mighty roar, reducing Nearby enemies' damage dealt by 40% for 4 seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Debilitating Roar also Fortifies you for 30% Maximum Life.

runes.name: Innate
description: You deal x25% increased damage while Debilitating Roar is active.

runes.name: Preserving
description: Debilitating Roar also Heals you for 6% of your Maximum Life each second for its duration.

skills.name: Earthen Bulwark
description: Rock's surround you for 3 seconds, granting a Barrier that absorbs {value1} of your Maximum Life in damage.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Earthen Bulwark makes you Unstoppable while active.

runes.name: Innate
description: Rock shrapnel flies outward when Earthen Bulwark is destroyed or expires, dealing 60% to surrounding enemies. This damage is increased by Barrier bonuses.

runes.name: Preserving
description: Casting Earthen Bulwark grants 18% Maximum Life as Fortify.

skills.name: Ravens
description: Passive: 1 Raven flies above you and periodically attacks your enemies for {value2} damage every 3 seconds.
Active: The target area is swarmed with ravens, dealing {value1} damage over 6 seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced

runes.name: Ferocious

runes.name: Brutal

skills.name: Poison Creeper

Active: Vines strangle all surrounding enemies, Immobilizing them for 2 seconds and Poisoning them for {value2} damage over 2 seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Pison Creeper's Immobilize and Poison durations are increased by 1 second.

runes.name: Ferocious
description: Pison Creeper's active Poisoning duration is increased by 3 seconds.

runes.name: Brutal

skills.name: Wolves
description: Passive: Summon 2 wolf companions that bite enemies for {value1} damage.
Active: Direct your wolves to focus an enemy, becoming Unstoppable, and leaping to them and striking for {value2} damage.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Wolves deal x25% increased damage to Immobilized, Stunned, Slowed, or Poisoned enemies.

runes.name: Ferocious
description: Lucky Hit: Your Wolves' attacks have up to a 40% chance to Fortify you for 8% Maximum Life.

runes.name: Brutal

skills.name: Boulder

skills.name: Affliction

skills.name: Blade Shift

skills.name: Forceful Arrow

skills.name: Heartseeker

skills.name: Puncture

While channeling lncinerate, you Burn

skills.name: Familiar

Summon a Familiar of the Element of your last cast Skill for 8 seconds. The Familiar chases enemies and periodically explodes, dealing {value1} of its Element's damage in an area.

skills.name: Focal Point
description: Gain a bonus based on the weapon type you wield. Casting a Focus Skill doubles this bonus for 5 seconds:
description_list: Polearm: + {value3} Lucky Hit Chance to make enemies Vulnerable

skills.name: Apex
description: You deal x {value1} increased Vulnerable damage. Double this bonus vs Elite enemies.

skills.name: Diminishment
description: Vulnerable enemies deal {value1} less damage to you.

skills.name: Endurance
description: Casting a Defensive Skill grants {value1} Vigor.

skills.name: Perseverance
description: Gain {value1} additional Damage Reduction per stack of Resolve.

skills.name: Fueled
description: Gain increased Life On Kill equal to {value1} of your Maximum Life while you have at least 4 stacks of Ferocity.

skills.name: Armored Hide
description: Passive: Gain {value1} Resolve every 5 seconds.
Active: Encase yourself, becoming Unstoppable and gaining +100% Block Chance for {value2} seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Activating Armored Hide grants you Maximum Resolve and increases your Thorns by [X] for the duration.

runes.name: Adaptable
description: When you Evade through enemies with Armored Hide active, you deal 100% of your Thorns to them and Heal for 5% of your Maximum Life per hit.

runes.name: Reinforced
description: While active, Armored Hide increases your Blocked Damage Reduction by +5% for every Nearby enemy, up to +20%.

skills.name: Concussive Stomp
description: Stomp in front of you, releasing a shockwave that deals {value1} damage and Knocks Down enemies for {value2} seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Concussive Stomp grants a Barrier equal to 10% of your Maximum Life per enemy hit for 3 seconds, up to 40%.

runes.name: Adaptable
description: When enemies recover from Concussive Stomp, you Dodge their next 3 attacks.

runes.name: Reinforced
description: Concussive Stomp gains an additional Charge and does x600% increased damage to Unstoppable enemies and Bosses.

skills.name: Counterattack
description: Passive: Gain 10% Dodge Chance and automatically retaliate against Close enemies for {value1} damage when you Dodge their attacks.
Active: Dodge all direct attacks for 3 seconds per cast, up to 6 seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Counterattack's Cooldown is reduced by 0.5 seconds per stack of Ferocity you have.

runes.name: Adaptable
description: When you Dodge a Control Impairing attack with Counterattack it will reflect that Crowd Control to all Close enemies for 2 seconds.

runes.name: Reinforced
description: Counterattack passively increases your Critical Strike Damage by x6% for every Close enemy, up to x30%.

skills.name: Scourge
description: Call forth a wave of insects that bite enemies, Fearing and Slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds while applying {value1} Poisoning damage over 6 seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Each time you hit an enemy with Scourge you gain x1% increased damage vs Crowd Controlled enemies for 6 seconds, up to x50%.

runes.name: Adaptable
description: Lucky Hit: Hitting an enemy affected by Scourge has up to a 60% chance to Life Steal 35% of the damage done, up to 35% of your Maximum Life.

runes.name: Reinforced
description: Casting Scourge grants 60% of your Maximum Vigor over 6 seconds.

skills.name: Antivenom
description: You gain + {value1} increased Poison Resistance and your Maximum Poison Resistance is increased by + {value2} .

skills.name: Nourishment
description: Your Healing is increased by +20%. Whenever you Heal, your Poison Damage is increased by x {value1} for 3 seconds.

skills.name: Patient Guard
description: Gain +10% Block Chance.
After standing still for 0.5 seconds, you gain + {value1} Block Damage Reduction until you next move.

skills.name: Bastion
description: Gain {value1} Thorns. While you have a Barrier your Thorns are increased by x20%.

skills.name: Auspicious
description: You accumulate {value1} of your Maximum Life as a Barrier every second, up to {value2} .
Taking damage prevents additional accumulation for 2 seconds.

skills.name: Resilient
description: For each Base Gorilla Skill on your Action Bar, gain {value1} Maximum Life, Knock Down Duration, and Barrier Generation.

skills.name: Dominant
description: Attempting to Knock Down an enemy increases your Gorilla Skill damage by x {value1} for 10 seconds.

skills.name: Payback
description: Smash enemies in front of you, dealing {value1} damage.
When attacked, you have a 35% chance to reduce Payback's active Cooldown by 1 seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Each time an enemy attacks you the damage they take from Payback is increased by x20% for 60 seconds, up to x200%.

runes.name: Poised
description: Payback passively grants you Vigor when you take damage. Payback is now a Core Skill and Consumes all available Vigor to increase its damage by x0.5% for each point Consumed.

runes.name: Invasive
description: Becoming Control Impaired while Payback is on Cooldown makes it free to cast and grants you Unstoppable for 5 seconds. Can only occur once every 8 seconds.

skills.name: Brilliance
description: Your Eagle Skill damage is increased by x {value1} of your Movement Speed bonus.

skills.name: Acceleration
description: Gain 1 additional Evade Charge. After you Evade or use a Mobility Skill, your Eagle Skills deal {value1} increased damage for 3 seconds.

skills.name: Razor Wings
description: Whirl out a cluster of razor sharp feathers that rebound back, dealing {value1} damage each way.
You can have up to 15 active Razor Wings.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Razor Wings makes enemies Vulnerable for 5 seconds when hitting with a Critical Strike or from behind.

runes.name: Poised
description: Razor Wings has a 10% chance to regain a Charge when they hit an enemy. Double this chance if you have an active Barrier.

runes.name: Invasive
description: Razor Wings lasts 300% longer and spiral outwards.

skills.name: Rushing Claw
description: Slash a short distance through an enemy, striking all enemies along the way twice for a total of {value1} damage.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Enemies hit by Rushing Claw take x20% increased damage from Rushing Claw, up to x100%.

runes.name: Poised
description: Rushing Claw now has 12 Maximum Charges. Casting it consumes all of its Charges to increase its damage by x50% per Charge and it hits a larger area.

runes.name: Invasive
description: Using Rushing Claw's last Charge will instantly refill 4 Charges by consuming 4 stacks of Ferocity.

skills.name: Potent
description: Hitting enemies with Jaguar Skills increases the damage they take from you by x {value1} up to x {value2} .

skills.name: Furnace
description: Jaguar Skills deal x {value1} increased Critical Strike Damage per stack of Ferocity.

skills.name: Touch of Death
description: Strike an enemy and infect them, dealing 5% damage and applying {value1} Poisoning damage over 9 seconds.
When the infection expires or the host dies, a swarm hatches and seeks enemies for 9 seconds, dealing {value2} damage per hit.
You can have up to 3 swarms active at once.

runes.name: Enhanced
description:
Touch of Death's infection Heals you for 2% of your Maximum Life per second for a total of 18% Maximum Life. You
Heal any remaining when the swarm hatches.

runes.name: Poised
description: Touch of Death is now a Core Skill which costs 70 Vigor and has no Cooldown.

runes.name: Invasive
description: Touch of Death's swarm bursts every second, applying 30% of its Base Poisoning damage over 6 seconds to surrounding enemies.

skills.name: Ravenous
description: Your Centipede Skills deal x {value1} increased damage. Double this bonus vs Healthy enemies.

skills.name: Oppressive
description: Your Centipede Skills deal x {value1} increased damage to Crowd Controlled enemies and gain +30% increased Crowd Control Durations.

skills.name: Vehemence
description: Your Potency Skills deal x {value1} increased damage, but have {value2} increased Cooldowns.

skills.name: The Protector
description: The Gorilla Spirit protects an area for 6 seconds, continuously smashing surrounding enemies for {value1} damage and granting you Barrier for 30% of your Maximum Life every 1.5 seconds.
Rank 5: The Protector's domain pulses 300% of your Thorns as Physical damage to enemies within every 0.5 seconds.

runes.name: Harmonious
description: The Protector's strikes deal x350% increased damage and all enemies within its area deal 30% reduced damage.

runes.name: Exalted
description: The Protector's area persists for an additional 6 seconds and Slows enemies and Small Missiles by 80%. While it's Nearby, you are Unstoppable and deal 30% increased damage.

skills.name: The Seeker
description: The Eagle Spirit swoops down and deals {value1} damage. After a short delay it blasts off dealing {value2} damage.
Rank 5: Elites hit twice by The Seeker have a 25% chance to refund a Charge, doubled against Bosses.

runes.name: Harmonious
description: The Seeker's first hit Knocks Down enemies for 4 seconds. Both its first and second hits are guaranteed to Critically Strike.

runes.name: Exalted
description: The Seeker constantly makes all Nearby enemies Vulnerable while active.

skills.name: The Hunter
description: Bound across the battlefield with the Jaguar Spirit, dealing {value1} damage upon landing and the rapidily slashing enemies in the area for {value2} total damage over 7 strikes.
Rank 5: After The Hunter pounces, your first hits have a 10% chance to Execute non-Boss enemies for 8 seconds.

runes.name: Harmonious
description: The Hunter overfills your Ferocity by 2 stacks and causes you to deal x50% increased damage to Injured enemies for 8 seconds.
Player attacks are guaranteed to Critically Strike for the duration of the Eagle Spirit.

runes.name: Exalted
description: Killing an enemy while The Hunter is present has a 40% chance to instantly reset its Cooldown. This chance is halved after each consecutive reset.

skills.name: The Devourer
description: The Centipede Spirit emerges, blasting enemies in a line for {value1} damage and spitting at others for {value2} damage. Lasts for 15 seconds.
Rank 5: The Devourer's damage is increased by 350% of your Healing Received Bonus, up to 400%.

runes.name: Harmonious
description: As it emerges, The Devourer launches 10 toxic globs that apply 210% Poisoning damage over 6 seconds wherever they land.
Enemies affected by toxic globs also take x100% increased Poison Damage.

runes.name: Exalted
description: While The Devourer is active, if a Non-Boss enemy's remaining Life becomes Poisoned they die instantly and unleash a Pestilent Swarm that deals 30% damage per hit to enemies it passes through.

skills.name: Resolution
description: Casting an Ultimate Skill grants x {value1} increased damage to Elites for 3 seconds. Double this bonus if you are only fighting one enemy.

skills.name: Spiritual Attunement
description: Your maximum Vigor is increased by {value1} while you have an Ultimate Skill equipped.

skills.name: Supremacy
description: Any enemies you kill while an Ultimate Skill is active grants a stack of Supremacy, each increasing your damage by x {value1} , up to x {value2} . When an Ultimate Skill ends, you gain 5 stacks of Supremacy, but you begin to lose one stack every second.

skills.name: Initiative
description: Casting an Ultimate Skill makes you Unstoppable for {value1} seconds.

skills.name: Intricacy
description: Upon casting an Ultimate Skill, the last Potency, Defensive, or Focus Skill you cast prior is reset and can be cast for free up to {value1} time in the next 7 seconds.

skills.name: Sustenance
description: Hitting enemies with Ultimate Skills Heals you for {value1} of your Maximum Life.

skills.name: Vital Strikes
description: You deal x100% increased damage to Vulnerable enemies.
After making an enemy Vulnerable, your next Direct damage dealt to them:
description_list: Heals you for 5% of your Maximum Life

skills.name: Adaptive Stances
description: The Base Spirit of a Skill cast grants:
description2: Casting a Skill of a different Base Spirit:
description_list2: Increases Core Stats by +100% for 7 seconds

skills.name: Prodigy's Tempo
description: Every 3rd consecutive cast of the same Basic Skill increases all purchased Skills' Ranks by 4 for 5 seconds.
Every 3rd consecutive cast of the same Core or Potency Skill reduces all Skills' active Cooldowns by 10%, increased by 2% for each of their Skill Ranks.

skills.name: Noxious Resonance
description: Your Critical Strikes cause your Poisoning on an enemy to burst, dealing 300% of the total Poisoning instantly to them and 10% of the burst to surrounding enemies before removing the Poisoning effect from the primary target.

skills.name: Eagle
description: Casting an Eagle Skill or Evading shoots 6 Storm Feathers, each dealing 140% Lightning damage and applying Vulnerable for 5 seconds. The Storm Feathers Movement Speed bonus is doubled and always active.
All Skills are now also Eagle Skills.
description2: Every other Cast is a guaranteed Critical Strike that grants you a 20% Vulnerable Damage bonus for 5 seconds.

skills.name: Jaguar
description: Every 15th time you deal direct damage to an enemy with a Jaguar Skill, unleash an additional strike dealing 20% of the damage you have dealt to them in the last 0.5 seconds.
All Skills are now also Jaguar Skills.
description2: Maximum Ferocity is increased by 1.
Gain 1 stack of Ferocity whenever you kill an enemy or damage a Boss.

skills.name: Gorilla
description: Casting a Gorilla Skill deals 150% Thorns to enemies you hit and grants a Barrier for 5% of Maximum Life, up to 30%, for 3 seconds.
All Skills are now also Gorilla Skills.
description2: Maximum Resolve inscreased by 2.
When you have at least 5 stacks of Resolve, you are Unstoppable.

skills.name: Centipede
description: Hitting an enemy with a Centipede Skill reduces their Damage by 2%, Slows them by 10%, and deals 70% Poisoning damage over 6 seconds, stacking up to a maximum of 8 times.
All Skills are now also Centipede Skills.
description2: Heal for 1% of your Maximum Life for every Nearby enemy you've Poisoned in the last 3 seconds, up to 5%.

skills.name: Skill Cast
description: Cast when the player casts any skill in combat.

skills.name: Injured
description: Cast when the player becomes Injured.

skills.name: Control Impaired
description: Cast when the player is hit with a Control Impairing Effect.

skills.name: Valiance
description: When you would be damaged for at least 15% of your current Life at once, Raheir comes to your aid to negate the damage, Knock Down Close enemies for 2 seconds, and grant you Unstoppable for 0.5 seconds.

skills.name: Shield Charge
basic_attack_description: Raheir bashes enemies with a tower shield, dealing 80% Physical damage and Fortifying you for 5% of your Maximum Life.
description: Raheir rushes forward aggressively, dealing 110% Physical damage and Taunting nearby enemies for 4 seconds.
Selecting a Mercenary Core Skill alters their wielded Weapon and Basic Attack.

skills.name: Ground Slam
basic_attack_description: Raheir swings a round shield at enemies, dealing 85% Physical damage. Every 3 swings, Raheir Heals you for 5% of your Maximum Life.
description: Raheir brutalizes the ground, dealing 160% Physical damage and Slowing enemies by 30% for 6 seconds. Targets in the center of the slam are Slowed by 60% instead.
Selecting a Mercenary Core Skill alters their wielded Weapon and Basic Attack.

skills.name: Raheir's Guard
description: Raheir grants you +15% Armor.

skills.name: Vanguard
description: Raheir Slows surrounding enemies by 40%.

skills.name: Raheir's Aegis
description: Raheir grants you 15% Resistance to All Elements.

skills.name: Draw Fire
description: When you use a Healing Potion, Raheir Taunts enemies around him for 4 seconds. Can only occur once every 20 seconds.

skills.name: Provoke
description: Raheir Taunts enemies around you for 5 seconds. You gain 5% Damage Reduction for each target, up to 20%.

skills.name: Crater
description: Raheir strikes the ground 3 times, each burst dealing 30% Physical damage and Pulling In enemies. The final burst additionally deals 40% more Physical damage and Stuns enemies for 2 seconds.

skills.name: Bastion-v2
description: Raheir takes a protective position for 5 seconds, redirecting 90% of the damage that would be dealt to surrounding allies to himself for 5 seconds.
Bastion's initial cast also grants surrounding allies Unstoppable for 1 second.

skills.name: Shield Throw
description: Raheir throws his shield, dealing 450% Physical damage and Taunting enemies for 5 seconds. The shield bounces up to 9 times and cannot bounce to the same target twice.

skills.name: Mocking Lure
description: You deal x15% increased damage to enemies Taunted by Raheir.

skills.name: Iron Wolf's Ward
description: When Raheir's Valiance is triggered, he Knocks Back Close enemies and Taunts Distant enemies for 4 seconds.
Raheir's Valiance Cooldown is reduced by 35%.

skills.name: Iron Wolf's Call
description: When Raheir's Valiance is triggered, your next 4 Core Skills within 10 seconds deal x25% increased damage and cost no Resource.
Raheir's Valiance Cooldown is reduced by 35%.

skills.name: Sundering Shield
description: Raheir's final Crater burst inflicts Vulnerable on enemies for 4 seconds.

skills.name: Inspiration
description: Enemies affected by Raheir's Ground Slam take x15% increased damage.
Allies affected by Raheir's Bastion deal x25% increased damage.

skills.name: Iron Wolf's Virtue
description: When Raheir's Valiance is triggered, he Heals you for 25% of your Maximum Life.
Raheir's Valiance Cooldown is reduced by 35%.

skills.name: Iron Wolf's Arrival
description: When Raheir's Valiance is triggered, he also casts Ground Slam and Shield Throw.
Raheir's Valiance's Cooldown is reduced by 35%.

skills.name: Consecrated Shield
description: Raheir's Shield Throw Consecrates enemies for 6 seconds. Directly damaging a Consecrated enemy Heals you for 6% of your Maximum Life, once per target.

skills.name: Massacre
description: You and Varyana stack Massacre together on kills. Certain stack thresholds grant Movement Speed:
description2: Massacre resets after 7 seconds of not killing an enemy.

skills.name: Cleave
basic_attack_description: Varyana slashes enemies with dual axes, dealing 58% Physical damage. She has a 45% chance to also deal 24% Bleeding damage over 3 seconds.
description: Varyana swings two axes in an arc in front of her, dealing 60% Physical damage and 24% Bleeding damage over 4 seconds.
Selecting a Mercenary Core Skill alters their wielded Weapon and Basic Attack.

skills.name: Shockwave
basic_attack_description: Varyana batters enemies with a mace, dealing 80% Physical damage with +20% increased Critical Strike Chance.
description: Varyana slams the ground for a brutal shockwave in front of her, dealing 80% Physical damage and Knocking Down enemies for 2 seconds.
Selecting a Mercenary Core Skill alters their wielded Weapon and Basic Attack.

skills.name: Hysteria
description: You gain +1% Attack Speed for 5 seconds whenever Varyana damages an enemy, up to +10%.

skills.name: Recklessness
description: Varyana's Cleave inflicts Vulnerable on enemies for 3 seconds.

skills.name: Crushing Force
description: When Varyana deals damage to an enemy, she has a 30% chance to Knock them Down for 2 seconds.

skills.name: Reprisal
description: If you become Crowd Controlled, Varyana leaps towards the enemy that inflicted it, dealing 128% Physical damage and Knocking Down surrounding enemies for 2 seconds on impact. This can only occur once every 12 seconds.

skills.name: Bloodthirst
description: Varyana enters Bloodthirst, gaining +30% Attack Speed, +200% Movement Speed, and Unstoppable for 7 seconds.
Varyana's Bloodthirst grants +10% Attack Speed to you for the same duration.

skills.name: Whirlwind-v2
description: Varyana spins violently in a line, repeatedly dealing 85% Physical damage and 30% Bleeding damage over 5 seconds.

skills.name: Earth Breaker
description: Varyana crushes the ground with her mace, leaving a tremor that deals 180% Physical damage over 3 seconds and Knocks enemies Down repeatedly.

skills.name: Ancient Harpoons
description: Varyana launches three harpoons ahead of her, piercing enemies for 200% Physical damage. She then rips them back, Pulling In and Stunning enemies for 4 seconds.

skills.name: Intimidated
description: While Varyana has Bloodthirst, enemies around her deal 15% reduced damage.

skills.name: Bloodlust
description: Varyana's Bloodthirst further increases your Attack Speed by +5%.

skills.name: No Escape
description: Varyana's Whirlwind Pulls In enemies every 1.5 seconds and gains 60% Size.

skills.name: Taste of Flesh
description: When you or Varyana deal direct damage to an enemy inflicted with any of her Bleeding effects, you Heal for 2% of your Maximum Life.

skills.name: Rampage
description: You deal x15% increased damage to enemies afflicted by any of Varyana's Crowd Control effects.

skills.name: Dismembering
description: Enemies damaged by Varyana's Earth Breaker are left exposed, causing your next hit against them within 3 seconds to be a guaranteed Overpower. This may only occur on the same target once every 5 seconds.

skills.name: Annihilator
description: Varyana's Ancient Harpoons additionally Slow enemies by 40% for 5 seconds. During this time, you gain x30% Lucky Hit Chance against those targets.

skills.name: Iron Grip
description: Varyana's Ancient Harpoons travel 33% farther and reduce enemies' Impairment Resistance by 50% for 5 seconds.

skills.name: Blasphemous Fate
description: Aldkin occasionally loses control of his curse, transforming into a ferocious demon for 22 seconds. This grants Aldkin powerful new abilities, but the unleashed evil curses you for its duration.
Curse of Darkness: Nearby enemies become Vulnerable.
Curse of Flames: Your direct damage Burns enemies for 30% damage over 3 seconds.
Aldkin's curse and demon form are determined by his Mercenary Core Skill.

skills.name: Haunt
basic_attack_description: Aldkin shoots a burst of dark bolts at an enemy, dealing 30% Shadow damage.
description: Aldkin emits 3 ghostly souls at enemies, each Haunting their victims and dealing 90% Shadow damage over 10 seconds. If a target dies while being Haunted, its soul jumps to another target.
Aldkin's Mercenary Core Skill alters his Fate and Basic Attack.

skills.name: Flame Surge
basic_attack_description: Aldkin hurls a flaming bolt at an enemy, dealing 90% Fire damage and 55% Burning damage over 4 seconds.
description: Aldkin channels a cone of flame for 4 seconds, repeatedly dealing 80% Fire damage.
Aldkin's Mercenary Core Skill alters his Fate and Basic Attack.

skills.name: Terrify
description: Hits of Aldkin's Haunt have a 30% chance to inflict Vulnerable on enemies for 4 seconds.

skills.name: Exhaustion
description: Aldkin's Shadow damage has a 10% chance to Daze enemies for 2 seconds.

skills.name: Covered in Ash
description: Hits of Aldkin's Flame Surge Slows enemies by 20% and deal an additional 60% Burning damage over 3 seconds.

skills.name: Raging Violence
description: Allies gain +15% Critical Strike Chance against enemies affected by Flame Surge.

skills.name: Field of Languish
description: Aldkin desiccates an area for 6 seconds, Slowing enemies within by 40% and reducing their damage dealt by 20%.

skills.name: Chain of Souls
description: Aldkin chains up to 10 enemies to himself, Tethering to them and dealing 84% Shadow damage over 3 seconds.
When the chains expire, they deal 35% Shadow damage and Stun their victims for 2.5 seconds.

skills.name: Storm of Fire
description: Aldkin rains a Fire Storm down from the sky that deals 300% Fire damage on impact and remains on the ground for 10 seconds. Every second, the Fire Storm Burns enemies within for 55% damage over 3 seconds.
Enemies hit by Fire Storm's impact or aftershocks have a 30% chance to be Stunned for 1 second.

skills.name: Wave of Flame
description: Aldkin conjures a mass of flames forward, repeatedly dealing 550% Fire damage, Knocking Back enemies, and destroying small missiles.

skills.name: Paranoia
description: Languishing enemies take x15% increased damage from you.
Lucky Hit: Attacks against Languishing enemies have up to a 20% chance to Daze them for 1 second.

skills.name: Condemned
description: You instantly kill Languishing enemies with less than 40% Life. Does not work on Elites.

skills.name: Amplified Suffering
description: Damaging a Soul Chained enemy detonates the chain early, dealing 50% Shadow damage around them.

skills.name: Shared Pain
description: Aldkin's Chain of Souls Cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds when a chained target dies.

skills.name: Eradication
description: Enemies killed within Aldkin's Fire Storm explode for 120% Fire damage.

skills.name: Ember's Gift
description: You restore 33% of your Primary Resource per second while inside Aldkin's Fire Storm.

skills.name: Burning Chaos
description: Aldkin's Wave of Flame Cooldown resets when you cast an Ultimate Skill.

skills.name: Raging Havoc
description: Enemies damaged by Aldkin's Wave of Flame take x15% increased Damage Over Time for 4 seconds.

skills.name: Wire Trap
basic_attack_description: Subo fires a toughened arrow at an enemy, dealing 80% Physical damage with a 30% chance to Stun for 1 second.
description: Subo places a concussive trap that arms after 0.8 seconds. When an enemy moves within range, it explodes for 80% Physical damage and Stuns enemies for 2 seconds.
Selecting a Mercenary Core Skill alters their wielded Weapon and Basic Attack.

skills.name: Molotov
basic_attack_description: Subo launches 5 bolts at an enemy, each dealing 30% Physical damage. The final bolt explodes, Slowing enemies by 50% for 2 seconds.
description: Subo tosses an incendiary at an enemy, dealing 10% Physical damage and Stunning them for 1 second before exploding into flames. For the next 5 seconds, enemies within the area repeatedly take 36% Burning damage over 3 seconds.
Selecting a Mercenary Core Skill alters their wielded Weapon and Basic Attack.

skills.name: Piercing Arrows
description: Subo's Heavy Shot now pierces through enemies.

skills.name: Ready At Hand
description: Direct damage to an Elite grants you +20% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

skills.name: Scorched Earth
description: Subo's initial Molotov explosions cause enemies to take x30% increased Damage Over Time from you for 3 seconds.

skills.name: Share a Drink
description: When one of Subo's Molotovs explodes, it has a 50% chance to drop a Healing Potion for you.

skills.name: Cover Fire
description: Subo charges a countless volley of arrows, then unleashes it over your position for 140% Physical damage that Slows enemies by 50% for 4 seconds.

skills.name: Trip Mines
description: Subo scatters 3 explosive traps that each arm after 1 second. When an enemy moves within range of one, it explodes for 300% Physical damage and Knocks Down enemies for 1.5 seconds.

skills.name: Snipe
description: Subo charges a massive piercing bolt, then unleashes it forwards for 450% Physical damage that Knocks Back enemies.

skills.name: Explosive Charge
description: Subo fires 4 Explosive Charges that stick to enemies. Each explodes after 7 seconds, dealing 60% Physical damage.
Explosive Charges detonate early if their target dies or takes Overpower damage.

skills.name: Pin Cushion
description: Subo's Cover Fire also Immobilizes enemies for 3 seconds.

skills.name: Opening Fire
description: You deal x25% increased Critical Strike Damage to enemies hit by Subo's Cover Fire for 4 seconds.

skills.name: Loaded Munitions
description: Subo's Wire Traps and Trip Mines inflict Vulnerable on enemies for 5 seconds.

skills.name: Mastermind
description: Subo's Wire Trap and Trip Mines gain 60% Size.
You and Subo gain +25% Crowd Control Duration.

skills.name: Incendiary Bolt
description: If Subo's Snipe hits the target he originally aimed at, a Molotov explodes on them.

skills.name: Ambusher
description: You gain x20% Lucky Hit Chance against enemies damaged by Subo's Salvo within the last 3 seconds.

skills.name: Thrillseeker
description: Your active Cooldowns are reduced by 0.5 seconds when an Explosive Charge explodes.
Explosive Charges now detonate after only 1.5 seconds.

skills.name: Bargaining Chips
description: Targets stuck with Explosive Charges take x5% increased Overpower Damage per Explosive Charge stuck.
Each Explosive Charge can be detonated by an additional 2 Overpowers before expiring.

skills.name: Seeker
description: Passive: Subo reveals all enemies and materials in the area.
Active: Subo calls out an enemy target, marking them for 10 seconds. Killing a marked enemy restores 50% of your Maximum Resource and reduces Subo's Seeker Cooldown by 10 seconds.

codexes.name: Accelerating Aspect
codexes.description: Critical Strikes with Core Skills increase your Attack Speed by + [10-30%] for 5 seconds.

codexes.name: Aphotic Aspect
codexes.description: Skeletal Priests empower your Skeletal Warriors' attacks to deal Shadow Damage and have a [5-25%] chance to Stun enemies for 1.5 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Abundant Energy
codexes.description: Crackling Energy has a [35-55%] chance to deal x40% increased damage and chain to an additional enemy.

codexes.name: Aspect of Accursed Touch
codexes.description:
Lucky Hit: Up to a [20-40%] chance for your Skills to inflict Vampiric Curse on enemies. Enemies afflicted with Vampiric Curse are also Vulnerable.

Vampiric Curse's stored souls deal x [20-60%] increased damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Adaptability
codexes.description: Basic Skills generate 5 additional Primary Resource, once per Skill. Basic Skills deal x [0.4-0.6%] increased damage for each point of Primary Resource you have.

codexes.name: Aspect of Alacrity

codexes.description: Your Golem has a [2-18%] chance to reduce its active Cooldown by 2 seconds and a [1-9%] chance to spawn a Corpse each time it damages an enemy with its normal attack.

codexes.name: Icy Alchemist's Aspect
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Shadow Imbued Skills have up to a 75% chance to release an explosion that deals [X] Cold damage to the target and surrounding enemies, Chilling them for 25%. If they were already Chilled or Frozen, increase this damage by x100%.

codexes.name: Imprisoned Spirit's Aspect
codexes.description: When Bone Spirit explodes inside a Bone Prison, it explodes an additional time, dealing [40-80%] of normal damage. Bone Spirit now prioritizes enemies inside a Bone Prison.

codexes.name: Incendiary Aspect
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Damage from your Pyromancy skills has up to a [7-27%] chance to restore 10 Mana.

codexes.name: Inexorable Reaper's Aspect
codexes.description: Sever now dashes you forward to attack instead. It becomes a Mobility Skill and costs no Essence, but has a [13.5-3.5] second cooldown.

codexes.name: Infiltrator's Aspect
codexes.description: Poison Trap no longer breaks Stealth and triggers no Cooldown or arm time while you are in Stealth. All Poison Traps activate when you exit Stealth and begin Poison Trap's Cooldown. Poison Trap's Cooldown is reduced by [10-50%] .

codexes.name: Insatiable Aspect
codexes.description: Kills extend the duration of your active Touch of Death swarms by 0.2 seconds. When a swarm is replaced early it bursts for [100-300%] of the damage it would have done.

codexes.name: Iron Blood Aspect
codexes.description: Gain [2-6%] Damage Reduction for each Nearby Bleeding enemy up to [10-30%] maximum.

codexes.name: Jolting Aspect
codexes.description: Every [3-1] seconds, you zap a nearby enemy for [X] Lightning damage. This effect is treated as a Shock Skill.

codexes.name: Juggernaut's Aspect
codexes.description: Gain [X] Armor, but your Evade has 100% increased Cooldown.

codexes.name: Lightning Dancer's Aspect
codexes.description: Lightning Storm and Lightning Bolt Critical Strikes have a 50% chance to spawn 3 Dancing Bolts that seek enemies in the area dealing [X] Lightning Damage. Your Dancing Bolts deal x30% increased damage.

codexes.name: Lightning Rod Aspect
codexes.description: Chain Lightning has a 25% chance to deal x [50-90%] increased damage. This chance is doubled against Bosses or Crowd Controlled enemies and prefers them as targets.

codexes.name: Luckbringer Aspect
codexes.description: Gain + [10-30%] increased Lucky Hit Chance while all damage bonuses from the Walking Arsenal Key Passive are active.

codexes.name: Mage-Lord's Aspect
codexes.description: The Vyr's Mastery Key Passive also grants x [6-10%] Damage Reduction, tripled while fighting a Close enemy.

codexes.name: Mangled Aspect
codexes.description: While in Werebear form, you gain [4-12%] Maximum Spirit Generation per second.

codexes.name: Mangler's Aspect
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Dealing direct damage to a Vulnerable enemy has up to a [30-50%] chance to Daze them for 2 seconds.

codexes.name: Menacing Aspect
codexes.description: Scourge continuously affects enemies around you for [5-9] seconds.

codexes.name: Mighty Storm's Aspect
codexes.description: The Earthen Might Key Passive also applies to your Storm Skills.

codexes.name: Mired Sharpshooter's Aspect
codexes.description: Caltrops is now a Marksman Skill that periodically throws [5-25] piercing daggers over its Duration, each dealing Shadow damage and applying Vulnerable for 3 seconds.

codexes.name: Moonrage Aspect
codexes.description: Kills have a 5% chance to summon a Wolf Companion to your side for [20-35] seconds. This effect is a Lucky Hit against bosses. Maximum 3 additional wolves. In addition, gain +3 Ranks to Wolves.

codexes.name: Needleflare Aspect
codexes.description: Thorns damage dealt has a [25-45%] chance to deal damage to all enemies around you and your Minions.

codexes.name: Nighthowler's Aspect
codexes.description: Blood Howl increases Critical Strike Chance by + [10-18%] . In addition, Blood Howl also affects Nearby Companions and Players for 3 seconds.

codexes.name: Opportunist's Aspect
codexes.description:
When you enter or break Stealth, you drop a cluster of exploding Stun Grenades around you that deal [X] Physical damage and Stun enemies for 1 second.

Your Stun Grenades deal x [25-45%] more damage.

codexes.name: Osseous Gale Aspect
codexes.description: Bone Storm consumes up to 8 Corpses to increase its duration by up to [5-15] seconds.

codexes.name: Overcharged Aspect
codexes.description: Your direct Lightning damage makes your Storm Skills deal x [0.8-1.3%] more damage to the enemy, up to [40-65%] . At maximum stacks, the target becomes Vulnerable.

codexes.name: Phasing Poltergeist's Aspect
codexes.description: When Bone Spirit explodes, it spawns 3 spirits that seek nearby enemies and deal [20-40%] of its damage. This effect can only occur once per cast.

codexes.name: Prodigy's Aspect
codexes.description: Using a Cooldown restores [10-30] Mana.

codexes.name: Protecting Aspect
codexes.description: When hit while not Healthy, a magical bubble is summoned around you for [2.5-6] seconds. While standing in the bubble, Players are Immune. Can only occur once every 90 seconds.

codexes.name: Raider's Aspect
codexes.description: Heal for [1-21%] Maximum Life when you Poison a Healthy enemy.

codexes.name: Rapid Aspect
codexes.description: Basic Skills gain + [15-35%] Attack Speed.

codexes.name: Ravager's Aspect
codexes.description: Shadow Step has an additional Charge and gains a charge when it kills an enemy. Casting Shadow Step increases its damage by x [9-18%] for 5 seconds, up to x [45 -90%] .

codexes.name: Ravenous Aspect
codexes.description: Killing a Vulnerable enemy grants you x [55-75%] increased Energy Regeneration for 4 seconds.

codexes.name: Raw Might Aspect
codexes.description: After you hit 15 enemies with your Shapeshifting Skills, your next Werebear Skill will deal x [40-60%] more damage and Stun enemies for 3 seconds.

codexes.name: Reaper's Aspect
codexes.description: Enemies you Poison have 100% Reduced Healing and your Eagle Skills gain + [10-30%] increased Critical Strike Chance against them.

codexes.name: Reaping Lotus' Aspect
codexes.description: Sever no longer returns and instead splits into 3 specters that expand out and back from its apex. Sever deals [180-240%] of normal damage.

codexes.name: Rebounding Aspect
codexes.description: Quill Volley's feathers explode at their apex and return to where they were cast, dealing [50-70%] of their normal damage both times.

codexes.name: Recharging Aspect
codexes.description: Each time Chain Lightning bounces, gain [2.5-5] Mana.

codexes.name: Rejuvenating Aspect
codexes.description: When falling below 20 Spirit, there is a [15-30%] chance to fully restore your Spirit.

codexes.name: Relentless Berserker's Aspect
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Damaging an enemy with a Core Skill has up to a [15-35%] chance to extend the duration of Berserking by 2 second. Double this duration if it was a Critical Strike.

codexes.name: Requiem Aspect
codexes.description: You gain [2-10] Maximum Essence per active Minion.

codexes.name: Resistant Assailant's Aspect
codexes.description:
Casting Concealment grants 10% Resistance and Maximum Resistance to all elements for 6 seconds.

Killing an Elite enemy reduces Concealment's cooldown by [6-14] seconds.

codexes.name: Rip and Tear Aspect
codexes.description:
Rushing Claw deals x [10-30%] increased damage and is empowered based on how many Charges it has when you Cast it:
1: Heals for 15% of your Maximum Life.
2: Guaranteed to Overpower.
3: Guaranteed to Critically Strike.
4+: Strikes an additional time.

codexes.name: Rotting Aspect
codexes.description: Decompose can chain and burst up to 4 additional targets. Explosions from Decompose deals x [15-35%] increased damage.

codexes.name: Runeworker's Conduit Aspect
codexes.description:
Critical Strikes with Storm Skills cause Lightning Bolts to periodically strike close enemies for 3 seconds, each dealing [X] Lightning damage.

Your Lightning Bolts deal x [25-40%] increased damage.

codexes.name: Ruthless Aspect
codexes.description: Your Critical Strike Chance with Jaguar Skills is increased against enemies by + [1-11%] for each 10% of their missing Life. Jaguar Skills gain 15% Critical Strike Chance.

codexes.name: Sacrificial Aspect
codexes.description: Your Sacrifice bonuses are increased by x [35-55%] .

codexes.name: Seismic-shift Aspect
codexes.description: Earth Spike deals x [50-70%] increased damage and launches 2 rows of spikes in a line.

codexes.name: Serpentine Aspect
codexes.description: Hydras deals x [0.3-0.5%] increased damage per Mana you had when Summoned. Casting Hydra Consumes all of your Mana.

codexes.name: Shademist Aspect
codexes.description: Your Minions deal [X] Corrupting damage per second to enemies around them. The damage over time lasts for [2-5] seconds after leaving the aura.

codexes.name: Shadowslicer Aspect
codexes.description: Dash spawns a Shadow Clone that also casts Dash, dealing [150-350%] of the Base damage.

codexes.name: Shattered Aspect
codexes.description: Explosions from the Shatter Key Passive deal x [30-50%] increased damage.

codexes.name: Shattered Spirit's Aspect
codexes.description: Casting Bone Spirit also launches 18 Bone Splinters in all directions, dealing x [200-600%] increased damage and generating 6 Essence per enemy hit.

codexes.name: Shepherd's Aspect
codexes.description: Companion Skills deal an additional [5-13%] damage per Companion you have.

codexes.name: Shivering Aspect
codexes.description: Enemies take up to x [35-55%] increased damage based on how much Chill or Stagger they have built up. You apply 15% more Chill.

codexes.name: Shockwave Aspect
codexes.description: Pulverize creates a shockwave that travels forward, dealing [80-120%] of its damage to targets in the path.

codexes.name: Skinwalker's Aspect
codexes.description: When you use a Shapeshifting Skill that changes your form, gain [5-25%] Life. If you are at full Life, gain the same amount as Fortify.

codexes.name: Skullbreaker's Aspect
codexes.description: Stunning a Bleeding enemy deals [25-45%] of their total Bleeding amount to them as Physical damage.

codexes.name: Slice and Dice Aspect
codexes.description: Twisting Blades' initial hit cleaves. Twisting Blades return [25-45%] faster.

codexes.name: Slaking Aspect
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: You have up to a [45-65%] chance to gain 20 Fury when a Core Skill deals direct damage to at least one Bleeding enemy. Your Maximum Fury is increased by [5-25] .

codexes.name: Smiting Aspect
codexes.description: You have + [13-23%] increased Critical Strike Chance against Injured enemies. While you are Healthy, you gain + [25-45%] increased Crowd Control Duration.

codexes.name: Snap Frozen Aspect
codexes.description: Each Chilled or Frozen enemy you Evade through grants you a Barrier that absorbs [X] damage for 5 seconds, absorbing up to a maximum of [X] damage.

codexes.name: Snowguard's Aspect
codexes.description: While within your own Blizzard and for 3 seconds after leaving it, you take [15-35%] less damage.

codexes.name: Snowveiled Aspect
codexes.description: Ice armor makes you unstoppable and grants you 25% Damage Reduction for [3.5-5.5] seconds.

codexes.name: Spirit Bond Aspect
codexes.description: [10-17.5%] of the damage you would take is redirected across your Companions. In addition, your Companions cannot die.

codexes.name: Splintering Aspect
codexes.description: Bone Spear's primary attack makes enemies hit beyond the first Vulnerable for 3 seconds. Bone Shards from Bone Spear deal [30-70%] bonus damage to Vulnerable enemies and pierce them.

codexes.name: Stable Aspect
codexes.description: While Unstable Currents is not active, your Shock Skills have a [6.5-17%] chance to trigger a free cast from it.

codexes.name: Starlight Aspect
codexes.description: Gain [25-45] Primary Resource for every 20% Life that you Heal or every 120% Life that you Overheal when at Maximum Life.

codexes.name: Starving Ravager's Aspect
codexes.description: Ravager no longer has a duration and instead drains [14-4] Vigor every second until depleted. Effects that extend Ravager instead generate Vigor.

codexes.name: Steadfast Berserker's Aspect
codexes.description: Gain [X] Fortify whenever you deal direct damage while Berserking.

codexes.name: Sticker-thought Aspect
codexes.description: Gain [X] Thorns while Channeling and for 3 seconds afterwards.

codexes.name: Storm Swell Aspect
codexes.description: You deal x [15-35%] increased damage while Ice Armor is active. This amount is increased by another 15% against Frozen enemies.

codexes.name: Stormchaser's Aspect
codexes.description: Tornado drags non-Elite enemies and deals x [20-40%] increased damage. Each enemy or object inside of the Tornado increases the damage by an additional x [10%] .

codexes.name: Stormclaw's Aspect
codexes.description: Critical Strikes with Shred deal [40-60%] of the damage dealt as Lightning damage to the target and surrounding enemies.

codexes.name: Stormcrow's Aspect
codexes.description: Ravens now deal Lightning damage which is increased by x [60-100%] . Ravens Active deals its full damage in half the time, and enemies inside it are Stunned.

codexes.name: Stormshifter's Aspect
codexes.description: While Hurricane is active, gain +5 Ranks to your Shapeshifting Skills.

codexes.name: Subterranean Aspect
codexes.description: Poison Creeper's active also casts Landslide in a circle around you. Earth Skills deal x [15-35%] increased damage to Poisoned enemies.

codexes.name: Symbiotic Aspect
codexes.description: When the Nature's Fury Key Passive triggers a free Skill, your non Ultimate Cooldowns of the opposite type are reduced by [2.5-6] seconds.

codexes.name: Tidal Aspect
codexes.description: Blood Wave fires 2 additional waves, each dealing [40-100%] of normal damage, but you can no longer recast it until the last wave ends.

codexes.name: Tormentor's Aspect
codexes.description: Enemies who move while Poisoned by you additionally take [50-250%] of your Thorns damage per second.

codexes.name: Torturous Aspect
codexes.description: Iron Maiden is now also a Darkness Skill and deals Shadow damage. Enemies have a [10-30%] chance to be Stunned for 1 second when they take damage from Iron Maiden.

codexes.name: Toxic Alchemist's Aspect
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Shadow Imbued Skills have up to a 75% chance to create a toxic explosion that applies [X] Poisoning damage over 5 seconds to the target and surrounding enemies. If they were already Poisoned, increase this damage by x100%.

codexes.name: Trickshot Aspect
codexes.description: Whenever Penetrating Shot damages an enemy, 2 additional arrows split off to either side. These side arrows deal [10-30%] of Penetrating Shot's Base damage and do not split.

codexes.name: Trickster's Aspect
codexes.description: Caltrops, Smoke Grenade, and Death Trap receive your Stun Grenade benefits and throw Stun Grenades that deal [X] Physical damage and Stun enemies for 1 second. Your Stun Grenades deal x [25-45%] increased damage.

codexes.name: Umbrous Aspect
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Critical Strikes have up to a [45-65%] chance to grant a free Dark Shroud shadow.

codexes.name: Undying Aspect
codexes.description: When you cast a Skill, you heal for [0.5-2.5%] Life. Double this bonus while below 50% Life.

codexes.name: Unrelenting Aspect
codexes.description: Every 3rd Crushing Hand smashes an additional 10 times around you for x [40-80%] of its damage.

codexes.name: Unyielding Commander's Aspect
codexes.description: While Army of the Dead is active, gain x [70-110%] Summoning Damage and your Minions take 90% reduced damage.

codexes.name: Vehement Brawler's Aspect
codexes.description: Casting an Ultimate Skill increases your damage by [10-30%] for 8 seconds. Gain 2 additional Ultimate Skill Ranks.

codexes.name: Vengeful Aspect
codexes.description:
Lucky Hit: Damaging a Vulnerable enemy has a 25% chance to create an Arrow Storm at the enemy's location, dealing [X] Physical damage over 3 seconds.

Your Arrow Storms deal x [45-65%] more damage.

codexes.name: Veteran Brawler's Aspect
codexes.description: Each time a Core Skill deals direct damage to an enemy, your next Charge, Leap, or Kick deals x [4-10%] increased damage, up to x [20-50%] .

codexes.name: Vigorous Aspect
codexes.description: Gain [7.5-17.5%] Damage Reduction while Shapeshifted into a Werewolf.

codexes.name: Virulent Aspect
codexes.description: When Rabies infects an enemy, reduce its Cooldown by [0.2-0.99] seconds, tripled when infecting Elite enemies. You deal x [25-50%] increased damage to enemies affected by Rabies.

codexes.name: Wanton Rupture Aspect
codexes.description: Double your Rupture's skewer radius, and all Bleed durations are increased by[ 30-60%] .

codexes.name: Weapon Master's Aspect
codexes.description: Your Weapon Mastery Skills have an additional Charge. Lucky Hit: Damaging an enemy with a Weapon Mastery Skill has up to a [40-60%] chance to Stun them for 2 seconds.

codexes.name: Wildbolt Aspect
codexes.description: Every [3.5-2] seconds, Distant enemies are Pulled in to you and take 10% increased damage for 3 seconds.

codexes.name: Wind Striker Aspect
codexes.description: Critical Strikes grant [8.5-19%] Movement Speed for 1 second, up to 6 seconds.

codexes.name: Windlasher Aspect
codexes.description: Casting Double Swing creates a Dust Devil that deals [X] damage to enemies in its path.

codexes.name: Winter Touch Aspect
codexes.description: When you Freeze an enemy, you deal [X] Cold damage to them. This effect is treated as a Frost Skill.

uniques.name: 100,000 Steps
secondary_stats: Evade Grants 10% Attack Speed for 3 Seconds
terciary_stats: Movement Speed per Walking Arsenal Bonus
terciary_stats__full: [5-7]% Movement Speed per Walking Arsenal Bonus
uniques.effect: When activating or refreshing the full Walking Arsenal Key Passive effect, you automatically cast Ground Stomp and gain [50-100] Fury. Can only occur once every 5 seconds.
uniques.flavor: "While many Barbarians remained in the Dreadlands, small groups from the Oxen, Crane and Bear tribes instead chose to search the land for a new home." - A History of the Children of Bul-Kathos

uniques.name: Ahavarion, Spear of Lycander
secondary_stats: 159.5% Critical Strike, Vulnerable, and Overpower Damage
terciary_stats: Lucky Hit: Up to a 15% Chance to Restore 66% Primary Resource
terciary_stats__full: Lucky Hit: Up to a 15% Chance to Restore 66% Primary Resource
uniques.effect: Gain a random Shrine effect for 20 seconds after killing an Elite enemy. Can only occur once every 30 seconds.
uniques.flavor: "The angel Lycander left us a portion of her power in this spear. It is all the proof I need that she watches over us still." - Oracle Argoysni

uniques.name: Airidah's Inexorable Will
uniques.effect: When casting an Ultimate Skill and again 5 seconds after, you Pull in Distant enemies and deal [X] Physical damage to them. This damage is increased by x [10%] per 1 points of Willpower you have.
uniques.flavor: "When I was born, I breathed in the wind and the storm and they gave me life. When I die, I will breath out, and return that gift to the skies." - Journal excerpt

uniques.name: Airidah's Inexorable Will
uniques.effect: When casting an Ultimate Skill and again 5 seconds after, you Pull in Distant enemies and deal [X] Physical damage to them. This damage is increased by x [12%] per 1 points of Willpower you have.
uniques.flavor: "When I was born, I breathed in the wind and the storm and they gave me life. When I die, I will breath out, and return that gift to the skies." - Journal excerpt
