uniques.flavor: "When I was born, I breathed in the wind and the storm and they gave me life. When I die, I will breath out, and return that gift to the skies." - Journal excerpt

uniques.name: Ancients' Oath
uniques.effect: Steel Grasp launches 2 additional chains. Enemies hit by Steel Grasp take x [40-60%] increased damage from you for 5 seconds.
uniques.flavor: "Weapons wielded by the fiercest warriors often catch the eye of the Ancient spirits. If the wielder is worthy, the spirits may bless the steel with their strength." - Gerti, Oxen Tribe Forgemaster

uniques.name: Andariel's Visage
uniques.effect: Lucky Hit: Up to a 20% chance to trigger a poison nova that applies [X] Poisoning damage over 5 seconds to enemies in the area.
uniques.flavor: The horrific whispers of the Maiden of Anguish flicker through your mind, pushing you ever closer to madness...

uniques.name: Arreat's Bearing
terciary_stats: Call of the Ancients Cooldown Reduction
terciary_stats__full: [23.5-32.5]% Call of the Ancients Cooldown Reduction
uniques.effect:
Ancients you summon are empowered.
Korlic creates an Earthquake that deals [X] Physical damage over 4 seconds when he leaps.
Talic leaves behind Dust Devils that deal [X] damage while he whirlwinds.
Mawdac ignites the ground Burning enemies for an additional [X] damage over 4 seconds when he upheaves the ground.
uniques.flavor: "Rise clansmen and reclaim our trampled honor! Ancients' blood runs through us all! We are storms - earth breaking, maelstrom wielding. The fire of the gods burn still! They are with us!" - Ealda

uniques.name: Asheara's Khanjar
uniques.effect: Hits with this weapon increase your Attack Speed by [4-8%] for 4 seconds, up to [30-50%] .
uniques.flavor: When Caldeum's gates closed, Asheara led her Iron Wolves out of the city knowing full well they would never return. Instead they roamed Kehjistan pledging their blades to any who were in need.

uniques.name: Assassin's Stride
secondary_stats: Casting a Mobility Skill grants +100% Movement Speed for 2 seconds
uniques.effect: Mobility Skills are always Shadow Imbued with [60-120%] increased potency. Lucky Hit: Damaging an Elite or Boss with a Mobility Skill has up to a [40-80%] chance to instantly triggers a free Shadow Imbuement explosion.
uniques.flavor: The Viz-Jaq'taar descended on the mages indiscriminately and silently as a plague. The wise took flight, whilst the foolish fortified their dwellings as if walls or wards protected from shadow.

uniques.name: Axial Conduit
terciary_stats: Chance for Chain Lightning to Hit Twice
terciary_stats__full: [13.5-22.5]% Chance for Chain Lightning to Hit Twice
uniques.effect:
Chain Lightning alternates between orbiting you and seeking up to 3 enemies. When it returns, it Consumes 6 Mana from you for each active Chain Lightning. After Consuming 66 total Mana, the bolt explodes for [X] Lightning Damage.

Chain Lightning expires if you don't have enough Mana for it to drain.
uniques.flavor: "Do not confuse your manipulation of lightning as control. The azure flame is its own master and needs no hand to wield it. You are merely a conduit for its chaos." -Ascribed to the mage Woh

uniques.name: Axial Conduit

uniques.name: Azurewrath
terciary_stats: Lucky Hit: Up to a 40% Chance to Deal [X] Cold Damage
terciary_stats__full: Lucky Hit: Up to a 40% Chance to Deal [1100-2700] Cold Damage
uniques.effect: Your Casts with this weapon apply Vulnerable for 3 seconds and Chill enemies for [10-30%] .
uniques.flavor: The ancient runeblade of the angel Izual, Azurewrath was miraculously spared the corruption that consumed its master.

uniques.name: Balazan's Maxtlatl
uniques.effect:
Each attack damages Close enemies for [100-150%] of your Thorns and deals 100% of this damage as Poisoning over 3 seconds.

Each time you've retaliated with Thorns, for 5 seconds the Poisoning damage is increased by 100%, up to 300%.

uniques.name: Band of First Breath
terciary_stats__full: [98-125]% Damage for 4 Seconds After Gaining Resolve
[8-12.5]% Lucky Hit Chance while You Have a Barrier
uniques.effect:
Casting Evade consumes 1 stack of Resolve to increase your damage dealt by [20-40%] for 5 seconds. 
Gain Armored Hide's Passive Effect.
uniques.flavor: A gentle whisper glides on the wind, words eluding mortal ken. It weaves through the soul like a melody forgotten, leaving naught but a name: Adarja, the First-Breather.

uniques.name: Bands of Ichorous Rose
terciary_stats: Chance for Poison Trap to Cast Twice
terciary_stats__full: [18.5-27.5]% Chance for Poison Trap to Cast Twice
uniques.effect:
Poison Trap always deals its full damage over 3 seconds and it benefits from all its upgrades, which are increased by x [50-150%] . 

Poison Trap also:
Benefits from Combo Points
Has no Cooldown during Inner Sight
Cooldown is reduced by Preparation

uniques.name: Bane of Ahjad-Den
uniques.effect: Every 12 seconds, your next Mighty Throw detonates its pulses instantly as Fire Damage and deals [400-600%] increased damage.

uniques.name: Banished Lord's Talisman
uniques.effect: After you spend 275 of your Primary Resource, your next Core Skill is guaranteed to Overpower. Your Critical Strikes that Overpower deal [20-60%] increased damage.
uniques.flavor: "His name has been lost to history, but to have been exiled from a land as cursed as Hawezar, his deeds must have been truly depraved." - Scholar's Notes

uniques.name: Battle Trance
secondary_stats: Lucky Hit: Up to a 20% chance to gain a stack of Frenzy
uniques.effect: Increase Frenzy's maximum stacks by 2 . While at maximum stacks, you deal [30-60%] increased damage and your other Skills gain [35-55%] increased Attack Speed.
uniques.flavor: "The change that overtook my brother in battle was terrifying. His eyes turned hard like diamonds, and the way he moved... it was like he was dancing to music only he could hear." - Captain Dervin

uniques.name: Beastfall Boots
uniques.effect:
When you cast an Ultimate Skill, your next Core Skill Consumes all of your energy and deals [0.25-0.75%] increased damage per Energy Consumed.

Using a Cooldown restores 25 Energy.
uniques.flavor: "Genai grew proud and fond of boasting of her hunting prowess. She claimed she was fast enough to catch even the spirit Leraye, who cursed her for such an insult." - Fable of Genai's Twenty Trials

uniques.name: Black River
terciary_stats: Chance for Corpse Explosion to Deal Double Damage
terciary_stats__full: [36.5-50]% Chance for Corpse Explosion to Deal Double Damage
uniques.effect: Corpse Explosion consumes up to 4 additonal Corpses around the initial Corpse, gaining [120-160%] damage and [42-50%] Size per additional Corpse consumed.
uniques.flavor: "The scrolls describe a river of tar that separated the living from the land of the dead. Any unfortunate soul who tried to cross would be dragged down into oblivion." - Notes of Scholar Kamien

uniques.name: Blood Artisan's Cuirass
terciary_stats: Damage for 4 Seconds After Picking up a Blood Orb
terciary_stats__full: [103.5-135]% Damage for 4 Seconds After Picking Up a Blood Orb
uniques.effect: When you pick up [10-3] Blood Orbs, a free Bone Spirit is spawned, dealing bonus damage based on your current Life percent.
uniques.flavor: "The infamous Necromancer Gaza-Thul's mastery over blood magic was indisputable. Many suspect that upon his death, his skin was used to fashion this eldritch armor." - Barrett's Book of Implements

uniques.name: Blood Moon Breeches
uniques.effect: Your Summoning Skills have a [3-7%] chance to randomly inflict Decrepify or Iron Maiden. You deal x [20-50%] increased Critical Strike Damage to enemies affected by your Curses.
uniques.flavor: A naturally occurring curiosity, the blood moon persists as a sign of woe for the most superstitious Zakarum faithful. Children born under it are often considered cursed and cast out, lest it spread.

uniques.name: Bloodless Scream
terciary_stats: Lucky Hit: Up to a 40% chance to deal X Shadow Damage
Lucky Hit: Up to a 15% Chance to Restore X Primary Resource
terciary_stats__full: Lucky Hit: Up to a 40% chance to deal [8500-13500] Shadow Damage
Lucky Hit: Up to a 15% Chance to Restore 66 Primary Resource
uniques.effect:
Your Darkness Skills Chill enemies for up to 100% and deal [100-200%] increased damage to Frozen enemies and Bosses.

Every 800 times you damage enemies with Darkness Skills, all Nearby enemies are Feared for 0.25 seconds before Freezing for 3 more seconds.
uniques.flavor: "My companion swung her odd weapon in a wide arc, and our pursuer stopped short. The look of horror on his face as his body fell to pieces will haunt me forever." - The Ebon Pages, Canto II, Verse XI

uniques.flavor: "Her lover's spirit faded and in her sorrow she wept frozen tears. Where they fell, roses of the purest ice would blossom each winter." - Greenslade's Tales, Chapter 7: "The Myth of Irina Coldheart"

uniques.name: Craze of the Dead God
uniques.effect:
When you would take direct damage, it is instead distributed as Poisoning over the next 10 seconds but increased by [30-0%] .

Lucky Hit: Direct damage has up to a 25% chance based on your Poisoned Life percentage to infect an enemy with Touch of Death.
uniques.flavor: T'an seized a spear and drove it thrice into his mad brother Tan. Alas, the craftier of the twin gods wove one last cunning snare. In place of blood, the wound wept venom and consumed all in its wake.

uniques.name: Crown of Lucion
uniques.effect: Each time you use a Skill with a Resource Cost, gain x [5-15%] increased damage and Resource Cost is increased by +30% for 4 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.
uniques.flavor: The prince of Hatred, fair as maggots over carrion. He claims no throne, crafts no realms, reigning over only a blackened, bitter heart. Some legends name him banished, while others dread his return.

terciary_stats: Blood Surge Drains + [X] Times from Elites
terciary_stats__full: Blood Surge Drains [2-3] Times from Elites
uniques.effect: Casting Blood Surge consumes nearby Corpses to cause mini novas, dealing [X] damage. This damage is increased by x10% for each enemy drained by your initial cast, up to x50%, as well as by x20% for each Corpse consumed.
uniques.flavor: In the blood dancer's grasp, a victim lies, A vessel dried 'neath darkened skies. Their life extinguished, veins burst and drained, In Cruor's embrace, forever enchained.

uniques.name: Dolmen Stone
terciary_stats: Movement Speed while Hurricane is Active
terciary_stats__full: [21-30]% Movement Speed while Hurricane is Active
uniques.effect: Casting Boulder while Hurricane is active will cause your boulders to rotate around you instead. Boulder's damage is increased by x [30-50%] for each one currently rotating. You may have up to 10 Boulders active at a time.
uniques.flavor: "As the hateful mob beat on his door, he gripped the pulsing shard tightly and screamed for calm. When he opened his eyes, all that greeted him was silence and the blood-smeared ruins of his cottage."

terciary_stats: Chance for Landslide Projectiles to Cast Twice

uniques.effect: Casts of Landslide leave behind Tectonic Spikes that deal [X] Physical damage over 2 seconds. Spawning a Landslide pillar within Tectonic Spikes has a [20-30%] chance to spawn two instead.
uniques.flavor: When Arreat was sundered, the world quaked. The Druid Aglainn journeyed far to chronicle the aftermath. Grief-stricken by the great mountain king's fall, he rent the earth anew.

uniques.name: Esadora's Overflowing Cameo
terciary_stats: Damage Reduction per Crackling Energy Charge
Movement Speed for 4 Seconds After Picking Up Crackling Energy
terciary_stats__full: [1.4-2]% Damage Reduction per Crackling Energy Charge
[16-25]% Movement Speed for 4 Seconds After Picking Up Crackling Energy
uniques.effect:
Crackling Energy now gains x10% damage for every level in Shock Skills you have equipped and enemies hit have a 2% chance to refund a charge. Upon reaching maximum Crackling Energy, you rapidly unleash all charges on the closest enemy to you dealing x [40-80%] increased damage. 
You cannot gain charges from hits while rapidly discharging.
uniques.flavor: The only thing more potent than Esadora's magic was her endless hatred of humanity. As she lay dying, the pale amulet around her neck drank in both.

uniques.flavor: Only Ebewaka has walked amid a dozen Guardians. In death, they waged war for his spirit, yet none prevailed. Thus, the Guardians shared dominion, granting Ebewaka to roam freely amid all their realms.

terciary_stats__full: Corpse Explosion Fears and Slows for [0.4-0.6] Seconds
uniques.effect: Instead of detonating immediately, Corpse Explosion summons a Volatile Skeleton that charges at a random enemy and explodes. Corpse Explosion's damage is increased by x [50-90%] .
uniques.flavor: "Can you not hear it? That endless scream from the cold earth beneath your feet!? They are down there, trapped, blind with rage! Waiting to drag us down into the sod!" - Ravings of Madman Gustav

uniques.flavor: "By fang, claw, spear, or sword - send the bastards back to the flames from which they crawled! Soak the peat with their blood! For Fiacla-Gar! For Scosglen!" - Nafain, during the Days of Ash

uniques.name: Iceheart Brais
uniques.effect: Enemies that die while Frozen, have a [21-40%] chance to unleash a Frost Nova.
uniques.flavor: The mad artisan saw his fingers turn black from frostbite as he worked the cloth, but refused to stay the needle and thread for even a moment.

uniques.name: Indira's Memory
secondary_stats: Casting Bone Spear Reduces Blood Wave's Cooldown by 2 Seconds
uniques.effect:
Blood Wave is additionally a Bone Skill that spawns a Bone Prison at its end point and increases your Blood Skill damage by x [20-40%] for 8 seconds when cast.

Bone Spear is additionally a Blood Skill that consumes a Corpse to launch a Bone Spear from it,. draining 10% of your Maximum Life on hit.

Only the player's Bone Spears can consume corpses.
uniques.flavor: The tears of Linarian turned bloody over Indira's torn body. Many days, unyielding, he poured his magic into sundered bone and rended sinew. Though the flesh did mend, his beloved did not rise...

uniques.name: Insatiable Fury
uniques.effect: Werebear form is now your true form, and you gain [2-5] Ranks to all Werebear Skills.
uniques.flavor: When the Days of Ash began, the great druid Nafain reminded his disciples that nothing, not even the loss of their humanity, was too great a sacrifice to protect Tr Dlra from Astaroth's flames.

uniques.name: Jacinth Shell
uniques.effect:
Spending Vigor Heals you for [5-10%] of your Maximum Life.

Every second, your active Cooldowns now drain 10% of your Maximum Life to reduce their durations by 2 seconds.
uniques.flavor: This ceremonial armor was once adorned during the He Sutsar Puch, where sacred blood is drawn by jacinth lancets and offered to flames. It retains the scents of incensed smoke and scorched copper.

While your Spirit Hall choices match: 
Their bonuses are 100% more potent.
 Skills of their Base Spirit gain [20-60%] Vigor Cost Reduction.
 Skills of their Base Spirit gain [20-60%] Cooldown Reduction.
uniques.flavor: During a Trial of Mists, a small spirit noticed an unclaimed boy. In pity, it spared him. "I will follow you always," vowed the boy. He remained true even after Ah Bulan called the spirit home.

uniques.flavor: "Do not allow your passions to become obsessions. Fuel the fire that burns within you, but it is madness to allow yourself to become ash to please an uncaring universe." - Last words of Master Selig

terciary_stats: Movement Speed while Cataclysm is Active

uniques.effect: While Cataclysm is active, you gain unlimited Spirit and deal x [20-40%] increased damage. Cataclysm receives your Lightning Bolt benefits.
uniques.flavor: A singed wedding band, faintly crackling. It evokes an old rhyme where a bride receives a ring from her beloved, causing them to be struck thrice by lightning. Only the bride was unscathed.

terciary_stats: Damage Reduction from Enemies Affected by Blood Skills
Chance for Blood Lance to Deal Double Damage
terciary_stats__full: [13-17.5]% Damage Reduction from Enemies Affected by Blood Skills
[15.5-20]% Chance for Blood Lance to Deal Double Damage
uniques.effect: You are Blood Lanced, and when Blood Lance would deal damage to you it instead Fortifies you for [1-4%] of your Maximum Life and has a 10% chance to form a Blood Orb. Blood Lance deals [10-40%] increased damage.
uniques.flavor: "The Cathedral of Light's earliest attempts at crafting their penitent armor was to infuse the plate with painful blood magic, before such acts were deemed heretical." - Barrett's Book of Implements

uniques.name: Nesekem, The Herald
uniques.effect:
Every 2 seconds, you randomly mark a Nearby enemy. Marked enemies are Vulnerable, and your attacks against them are guaranteed to Critically Strike and Overpower.

Hitting a marked enemy 10 times clears the mark from them.
uniques.flavor: In the days when Ajaw Y'ishich ruled Nahantu, the phoenix constellation's crown fell in burning glory. From it was forged a blade that withered valor, heralding an age of despair.

uniques.name: Okun's Catalyst
secondary_stats: Ball Lightning Can Be Cast While Moving
terciary_stats: Attack Speed for 5 seconds After Casting a Defensive Skill
Damage Reduction for Each Active Ball Lightning
Chance for Ball Lightning Projectiles to Cast Twice
uniques.effect: Casting Ball Lightning instead creates a separate static field around you that damages all enemies within for [210-250%] Ball Lightning's damage per active ball. You are Unhindered as long as the field is active.
uniques.flavor: "Children and beast do tremble at thunder's roar, but the wise know to fear the silence of lightning." - Okun, of the Zann Esu

uniques.name: Ophidian Iris
uniques.effect:
Hydra is now a Core Skill and always Summons a 3-headed Hydra whose attacks explode on impact.

For each head above 3 that it would have had, the Hydra instead grows larger and deals x [50-100%] increased damage.

uniques.name: Overkill
uniques.effect: Death Blow creates a shockwave, dealing [60-80%] of its Base damage to enemies. Enemies who die to this effect also reset Death Blow's Cooldown.
uniques.flavor: The malformed snake creatures that live in the swamps are not content with simply killing their prey. They seem to take a malicious pleasure from inflicting as much suffering as possible before death.

uniques.name: Paingorger's Gauntlets
terciary_stats: Lucky Hit: Up to a [X%] Chance to Stun for 2 Seconds
terciary_stats__full: Lucky Hit: Up to a [13.5-22.5]% Chance to Stun for 2 Seconds
uniques.effect: Damaging enemies with a Non-Basic Skill marks them for 3 seconds. When a Basic Skill first hits a marked enemy, the Basic Skill's damage is echoed to all marked enemies, dealing x [75-125%] increased damage.
uniques.flavor: Crafted from fragments of Duriel's carapace, wearing these gloves, or being struck by them, causes an agonizing sensation akin to pushing one's hands through a thousand shards of glass.

uniques.name: Path of Trag'Oul
uniques.effect: Bone Prison traps a larger area and fires [10-30] Bone Splinters at enemies trapped within. Increase your Maximum Essence by 2 for 10 seconds each time these Bone Splinters hit an enemy.
uniques.flavor: "Essence flows endlessly, shifting between vessels. It is through Trag'Oul, keeper of all known and unknown, that we serve as custodians, directing essence to travel new paths." -Mendeln ul-Diomed

uniques.name: Peacemonger's Signet
terciary_stats: All Stats per Ferocity or Resolve Stack
terciary_stats__full: [3-4] All Stats per Ferocity or Resolve Stack
uniques.effect:
While you have at least 4 stacks of Ferocity, you gain [1-7] Vigor per second.

Gaining Ferocity also grants Resolve.
uniques.flavor: "In Natsalarwaka, no blood shall mar the earth. Even bitter enemies must forgo their blades before entering the haven. Breaking this accord will invoke Wasipotsu's wrath." - Oral Umbuntu Scripture

While you have at least 4 stacks of Ferocity, you gain [8.4] Vigor per second.

Gaining Ferocity also grants Resolve.
uniques.flavor: "In Natsalarwaka, no blood shall mar the earth. Even bitter enemies must forgo their blades before entering the haven. Breaking this accord will invoke Wasipotsu's wrath." - Oral Umbuntu Scripture

uniques.name: Ring of the Midday Hunt
terciary_stats: Movement Speed for 2 Seconds After Killing an Enemy
terciary_stats__full: [17.5-23]% Movement Speed for 2 Seconds After Killing an Enemy
uniques.effect:
Your Maximum Vigor is increased by 50% and every kill grants you [1-7] Vigor.

While you have any Ferocity, your Poisoning effects deal their damage across 33% of the normal duration.
uniques.flavor: At midday thundered the first brother, Nyamoyo, lord of predators. Survival is his blessing, hunting is his prayer. Honor him and prowess shall be your reward." - The Nit S, Verse IV

uniques.flavor: "At midnight laughed the second brother, Nebahayomo, spirit of cunning. Trickery is his blessing, suffering is his prayer. Honor him and shrewdness shall be your reward." - The Nit S, Verse V

uniques.name: Ring of the Ravenous

uniques.flavor: "The hunger, it starts so small, like a tickle in the back of your mind. You believe the lie that you still have control until you're so far gone you can't even recognize yourself." - Varyana

Chance for Pestilent Swarms to deal Double Damage
terciary_stats__full: Lucky Hit: Up to a [43.3-47.3]% Chance to Make Enemies Vulnerable for 2 Seconds
uniques.effect:
A Pestilent Swarm spawns from you every 4 seconds, dealing [X] Poison damage per hit.

Your Pestilent Swarms now orbit around you and generate 3 Vigor per hit.
uniques.flavor: "Within this corpse-bound carapace we writhe. Chaotic winds converge to churn your bones. Our beat and breath a ceaseless war to break. The wretched cyclone black beyond the bounds." - Balazan's Dream

uniques.name: Rod of Kepeleke
terciary_stats: Chance for Core Skills to Hit Twice
terciary_stats__full: [26-35]% Chance for Core Skills to Hit Twice
uniques.effect:
Your Core Skills are now additionally Basic Skills and free to cast.

When cast at Maximum Vigor, your Core Skills Consume all Vigor to return to full damage, cast at their largest Size, and become guaranteed Critical Strikes, with x [0.15-0.75%] increased Critical Strike Damage for each point of Vigor Consumed this way.
uniques.flavor: "Beyond the world disc doth lie the keeper serpent Kepeleke. Ceaseless the serpent grows, and thus must ever consume his own tail, lest the world be overtaken." - Lintel XII

Your Summons' damage afflict enemies with Vampiric Curse. Consuming a Corpse also contributes a soul to Vampiric Curse, which can now stack up to 20 souls.

uniques.effect: Your Healing Potion no longer Heals instantly, instead it grants a Barrier for 200% of the healing for 4 seconds. You gain [10-30%] Damage Reduction while you have a Barrier and may drink your Healing Potion while at full Life.
uniques.flavor: "To create such an artifact would require an impossible mastery over alchemy, transmutation and the subtle magics of the soul. By all rights, it should not exist, yet it does."

uniques.name: Starfall Coronet
uniques.effect:
Meteor's Mana cost is replaced with a [5-2.5] second Cooldown and 3 total Charges. 

Casting Meteor drops 3 additional Meteors around the target. Its Enchantment and Enhancement drop 1 additional Meteor instead.
uniques.flavor: "The elders say they saw a star falling from the sky many years ago. A sign from the heavens that the end times were nigh. A rallying cry to take up arms and protect Sanctuary!" - Crusader Hamilton

terciary_stats: Chance for Stone Burst to Cast Twice
terciary_stats__full: [21-30]% Chance for Stone Burst to Cast Twice
uniques.effect:
While Channeling Stone Burst and for 2 seconds afterwards, you gain 15% Damage Reduction.

Stone Burst's final explosion deals x [15-20%] increased damage, further increased by x [15-20%] for each size increase.
uniques.flavor: Long ago, the Stone Clan laid the foundations of Old Kurast. They shaped earthen marvels, but wars with the Vizjerei turned chisel into spear. Now the only stone they wield is when cast against foe.

uniques.name: Storm's Companion
terciary_stats: [X]% to the Pack Leader Spirit Boon's Lucky Hit Chance
terciary_stats__full: [62.5-85]% to the Pack Leader Spirit Boon's Lucky Hit Chance
uniques.effect: Your Wolf Companions are infused with the power of the storm, dealing Lightning damage and gaining the Storm Howl ability.
uniques.flavor: "The storm's rage is my own, brother. I call, and the skies roar in reply." - Vasily, to Bul-Kathos

uniques.name: Strike of Stormhorn
secondary_stats: Chance for Ball Lightning Projectiles to Cast Twice is Now Chance to Cast a Super Ball Lightning
terciary_stats: Chance for Ball Lightning Projectiles to Cast Twice
uniques.effect:
Ball Lightning splashes on impact dealing [260-300%] of its total damage instantly and Stunning enemies for 1 second if it reaches its Maximum Range.
Super Ball Lightnings are larger, deal x125% more damage, have a higher Lucky Hit Chance, and its Stun duration is increased to 3 seconds.
uniques.flavor: The height of the Moon Clan's power brought a beast that instilled dread upon Khanduras. More demon than Khazra, the one dubbed the Stormhorn left charred brands where cities once stood.

uniques.name: Sunbird's Gorget

Every 5 additional Storm Feathers you pick up intensifies the firestorm, increasing its damage by x100% but not refreshing its duration. Storm Feathers are now Jaguar Skills, and the firestorm is an Eagle, Jaguar, and Storm Feather Skill.

uniques.effect: Casting a Pyromancy, Shock, or Frost Skill increases your damage by [10-20%] for 8 seconds, stacking once per Element. Casting again refreshes all bonuses if the previous skill was a different Element.
uniques.flavor: "Fool said he dug it out of the sands near Lut Gholein with a few other 'worthless trinkets'. I hid my delight at receiving such a treasure in exchange for a meager handful of coins." Rakhaan

uniques.name: Tassets of the Dawning Sky
uniques.effect: When you take damage from a Non-Physical damage type, you gain [8-15%] Maximum Resistance to that damage type for 6 seconds. Can only apply to one damage type at a time.
uniques.flavor: May the Light of Father Inarius shine down upon all weary travelers of this holy land. Turn your face toward his radiance and find your strength renewed. - Statue Inscription

terciary_stats__full: Lucky Hit: Up to a 15% Chance to Heal [209-298] Life
uniques.effect: Effects that Heal you beyond 100% Life grant you a Barrier up to [40-100%] of your Maximum Life that lasts for 8 seconds. You may now drink your Healing Potion while at full Life.
uniques.flavor: "The revelation that master tailor Callas was in fact a witch only served to further fuel the desire for her uniquely enchanted legwraps." - Barrett's Book of Implements

uniques.flavor: "Listen, child, to the music of the storm. It has its own rhythm. Its own melody. Hear how beautifully it sings, and perhaps one day you will be able to join in its harmony." - Airidah

Skeletal Arch-Mages teleport to safety when attacked and their attacks occasionally shatter on impact dealing [50-100%] increased damage to the target and up to 3 additional targets.

uniques.effect: You deal [10-20%] increased damage while Unstoppable and for 5 seconds after. When you become Unstoppable, gain 50 of your Primary Resource.
uniques.flavor: "The younger apprentices think wearing heavy plate in the swamps is foolish. They fail to understand that our armor is our legacy, and without it we are nothing." - Crusader Pembroke

uniques.name: Tuskhelm of Joritz the Mighty
uniques.effect: When you gain Berserking while already Berserk, you become more enraged granting x [35-50%] increased damage, 6 Fury per second, and 10% Cooldown Reduction.
uniques.flavor: As he fought with side by side with Raekor to liberate the labor camp, Joritz claimed this dented helm from a fallen foe. As his legend grew, its unique shape became synonymous with his great deeds.

uniques.flavor: "When hitting it once doesn't kill it, hit it twice." - Bear Tribe Proverb

uniques.flavor: "Thus Tyrael, a perfect aspect of Justice, came to be. None were more vehement against the forces of hell. All demonic entities learned to shudder at Justice's might." - The Books of Jarl, Volume I

Lightning Storm gains 1 additional strike each times it grows.
Lightning Storm Critical Strikes cause lightning to strike twice, dealing [60-100%] increased damage.
uniques.flavor: "The storm caller returns, day after day, demanding to meet the Tree. He beats his chest and demonstrates his powers, refusing to believe that he will never be chosen." - Excerpt from Gulyas' Diary

uniques.flavor: "Roots from the Great Oak growing at the seaward statue of Vasily will, on rare occasions, be found twisted back upon themselves, suffused with ferocious magic." - Barrett's Book of Implements

uniques.flavor: Your incantations are echoed by a chorus of the damned. Wield their torment, their vengeance, their pain against the Hellborne that tortured them.

uniques.name: Waxing Gibbous
secondary_stats: +50% Chance for Shred to Deal Double Damage
terciary_stats: Blood Howl Grants Stealth for [X] Seconds
terciary_stats__full: Blood Howl Grants Stealth for [2.2-3] Seconds
uniques.effect: Killing an enemy with Shred grants Stealth for 2 seconds. Breaking Stealth with an attack grants guaranteed Critical Strikes for [1-4] seconds.
uniques.flavor: The nights preceding the full moon are sometimes far more dangerous than the event itself. The frenzy has begun to rise, yet the night is just dark enough to obscure a hunter from their prey's sight.

uniques.name: Wildheart Hunger
secondary_stats: Attacks Reduce Evade's Cooldown by 1.5 Seconds
uniques.effect: Shapeshifting into a new animal form increases the value of your Bestial Rampage bonuses by + [2-5%] , up to + [20-50%] . This bonus decays by 0.5% per second.
uniques.flavor: Do not seek comfort in the shapes of the moon, beastwalker. Its pallid light awakens a yawning hunger. Call the beast, but do not tarry. Lest you never return to your own skin.

uniques.name: Windforce
terciary_stats: Chance for Barrage Projectiles to Cast Twice
terciary_stats__full: [37-55]% Chance for Barrage Projectiles to Cast Twice
uniques.effect: Hits of Barrage have a [50-75%] chance to deal triple damage and Knock Down enemies.
uniques.flavor: "There have been numerous world-shaping conflicts throughout history. This bow has been found on the battlefield of every one, and always in the hands of the victors." - Barrett's Book of Implements

uniques.name: Word of Hakan
terciary_stats: Chance for Rain of Arrows to Deal Double Damage
terciary_stats__full: [16-25]% Chance for Rain of Arrows to Deal Double Damage
uniques.effect:
Your Rain of Arrows is always Imbued with all Imbuements at once and receives your Arrow Storm benefits.
 
Gain x [30-50%] increased damage to Distant enemies.
uniques.flavor: "Let the great gates of Caldeum be sealed. Let its proud walls stand fiercely defended. The rest of Kehjistan may suffer this plague, but my city, and my people, will not." - Proclamation of Hakan II

uniques.effect:
Every time you deal Thorns damage, you gain [1-7] Vigor.

Gain Toxic Skin's Passive Effect.
uniques.flavor: The inner curve of this band is lined with thorns that tear the skin whenever it is unbound.

uniques.name: Writhing Band of Trickery
uniques.effect: Your Subterfuge Skills create a Decoy Trap that Taunts and lures enemies, dealing [X] Corrupting damage over 6 seconds. This counts as a Trap Skill and only one Decoy Trap can be active at a time
uniques.flavor: The ring shifts and spins on your finger as the forces within desperately attempt to escape.

uniques.name: Wushe Nak Pa
secondary_stats: Attacks Reduce Ultimate Cooldown by 0.4 Seconds
terciary_stats__full: Casting Ultimate Skills Restores [40-52] Primary Resource
uniques.effect:
Casting an Ultimate Skill grants or amplifies its matching Primary Spirit Hall Bonus with [200-300%] potency for 15 seconds.

Your Ultimate Skills each gain an additional Skill Type:
 The Seeker is a Focus Skill.
 The Hunter is a Mobility Skill.
 The Devourer is a Potency Skill.
 The Protector is a Defensive Skill.
uniques.flavor: "Fear not the limits of your flesh, Spiritborn!  As our ancestors said: wshe nak pa! Transcend your being!" - Maka

uniques.name: Yen's Blessing
uniques.effect: Casting a Skill has a [40-60%] chance to cast a Non-Mobility, Non-Ultimate Skill that is currently on Cooldown. Can only occur once every 8 seconds.
uniques.flavor: These greaves are imbued with the divine blessing of Yen, the Veradani goddess of restoration. They bestow the wearer a revitalizing strength that enhances their own.

skillsPTR.name: Bash
description: Bash the enemy with your weapon, dealing {value1} damage. After bashing enemies 4 times, your next Bash will clobber, Stunning enemies for 1.5 seconds. Clobber twice as often while using a Two-Handed weapon.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Clobbering an enemy grants you 10% Maximum Life as Fortify.

runes.name: Battle
description: Clobbering an enemy generates an additional 10 Fury.

runes.name: Combat
description: After Critically Striking 4 times with Bash using a Two-Handed weapon, your next Core or Weapon Mastery Skill will Overpower.

skillsPTR.name: Flay
description: Flay the enemy, dealing {value1} damage and inflicting {value2} Bleeding damage over 5 seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Flay has a 50% chance to make the enemy Vulnerable for 5 seconds. Double this chance when using a Two-Handed weapon.

runes.name: Battle
description: When Flay deals direct damage to an enemy, they take x15% increased Bleeding damage from you for the next 3 seconds.

runes.name: Combat
description: When Flay deals direct damage to an enemy, you gain 4% Damage Reduction and [X] Thorns for 6 seconds. This stacks up to 5 times.

skillsPTR.name: Frenzy
description: Unleash a rapid flurry of blows, dealing {value1} damage with each pair of hits.
If Frenzy hits an enemy, its Attack Speed is increased by +20% for 3 seconds, up to +60%.

runes.name: Enhanced

codexesPTR.name: Flamewalker's Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Flesh-Rending Aspect
codexesPTR.description: When Decompose explodes, gain [25-45] Essence.

codexesPTR.name: Frostbitten Aspect
codexesPTR.description:
Enemies hit by your Grenade Skills have a chance equal to your Critical Strike Chance to be Frozen for 2 seconds.

You deal x [10-30%] increased Critical Strike Damage against Frozen or Stunned enemies.

codexesPTR.name: Frostblitz Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Frost Nova gains an additional Charge but the Cooldown per Charge is increased by [55-35%] .

codexesPTR.name: Galvanized Slasher's Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Lucky Hit: Damaging an enemy with a Mobility Skill has a [15-35%] chance to restore 100 Energy. Your Maximum Energy is increased by [15-35] .

codexesPTR.name: Ghostwalker Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Glacial Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Gravitational Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Hectic Aspect
codexesPTR.description: After casting 5 Basic Skills, one of your active Cooldowns is reduced by [1-2.5] seconds.

codexesPTR.name: High Velocity Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Icy Alchemist's Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Lucky Hit: Shadow Imbued Skills have up to a 75% chance to release an explosion that deals [X] Cold damage to the target and surrounding enemies, Chilling them for 25%. If they were already Chilled or Frozen, increase this damage by x100%.

codexesPTR.name: Imprisoned Spirit's Aspect
codexesPTR.description: When Bone Spirit explodes inside a Bone Prison, it explodes an additional time, dealing [40-80%] of normal damage. Bone Spirit now prioritizes enemies inside a Bone Prison.

codexesPTR.name: Incendiary Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Lucky Hit: Damage from your Pyromancy skills has up to a [7-27%] chance to restore 10 Mana.

codexesPTR.name: Inexorable Reaper's Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Sever now dashes you forward to attack instead. It becomes a Mobility Skill and costs no Essence, but has a [13.5-3.5] second cooldown.

codexesPTR.name: Infiltrator's Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Poison Trap no longer breaks Stealth and triggers no Cooldown or arm time while you are in Stealth. All Poison Traps activate when you exit Stealth and begin Poison Trap's Cooldown. Poison Trap's Cooldown is reduced by [10-50%] .

codexesPTR.name: Insatiable Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Iron Blood Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Jolting Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Juggernaut's Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Gain [X] Armor, but your Evade has 100% increased Cooldown.

codexesPTR.name: Lightning Dancer's Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Lightning Rod Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Luckbringer Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Mage-Lord's Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Mangled Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Mangler's Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Menacing Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Mighty Storm's Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Needleflare Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Nighthowler's Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Opportunist's Aspect

When you enter or break Stealth, you drop a cluster of exploding Stun Grenades around you that deal [X] Physical damage and Stun enemies for 1 second.

codexesPTR.name: Osseous Gale Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Phasing Poltergeist's Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Prodigy's Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Using a Cooldown restores [10-30] Mana.

codexesPTR.name: Protecting Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Raider's Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Rapid Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Ravager's Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Shadow Step has an additional Charge and gains a charge when it kills an enemy. Casting Shadow Step increases its damage by x [9-18%] for 5 seconds, up to x [45 -90%] .

codexesPTR.name: Ravenous Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Raw Might Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Reaper's Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Recharging Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Requiem Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Rip and Tear Aspect

Rushing Claw deals x [10-30%] increased damage and is empowered based on how many Charges it has when you Cast it:
1: Heals for 15% of your Maximum Life.
2: Guaranteed to Overpower.
3: Guaranteed to Critically Strike.
4+: Strikes an additional time.

codexesPTR.name: Rotting Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Runeworker's Conduit Aspect

Your Lightning Bolts deal x [25-40%] increased damage.

codexesPTR.name: Sacrificial Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Your Sacrifice bonuses are increased by x [35-55%] .

codexesPTR.name: Serpentine Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Shadowslicer Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Shattered Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Skullbreaker's Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Slice and Dice Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Snap Frozen Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Starlight Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Sticker-thought Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Stormchaser's Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Tornado drags non-Elite enemies and deals x [20-40%] increased damage. Each enemy or object inside of the Tornado increases the damage by an additional x [10%] .

codexesPTR.name: Stormclaw's Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Stormcrow's Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Tidal Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Tormentor's Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Toxic Alchemist's Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Lucky Hit: Shadow Imbued Skills have up to a 75% chance to create a toxic explosion that applies [X] Poisoning damage over 5 seconds to the target and surrounding enemies. If they were already Poisoned, increase this damage by x100%.

codexesPTR.name: Trickshot Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Trickster's Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Caltrops, Smoke Grenade, and Death Trap receive your Stun Grenade benefits and throw Stun Grenades that deal [X] Physical damage and Stun enemies for 1 second. Your Stun Grenades deal x [25-45%] increased damage.

codexesPTR.name: Umbrous Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Undying Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Unrelenting Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Unyielding Commander's Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Vehement Brawler's Aspect

codexesPTR.name: Vengeful Aspect
codexesPTR.description:
Lucky Hit: Damaging a Vulnerable enemy has a 25% chance to create an Arrow Storm at the enemy's location, dealing [X] Physical damage over 3 seconds.

Your Arrow Storms deal x [45-65%] more damage.

codexesPTR.name: Veteran Brawler's Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Each time a Brawling Skill deals direct damage to an enemy, your Charge, Leap, or Kick deals x [4-10%] increased damage for 5 seconds, up to x [20-50%] .

codexesPTR.name: Vigorous Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Gain [7.5-17.5%] Damage Reduction while Shapeshifted into a Werewolf.

codexesPTR.name: Virulent Aspect
codexesPTR.description: When Rabies infects an enemy, reduce its Cooldown by [0.2-0.99] seconds, tripled when infecting Elite enemies. You deal x [25-50%] increased damage to enemies affected by Rabies.

codexesPTR.name: Wanton Rupture Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Double your Rupture's skewer radius, and all Bleed durations are increased by[ 30-60%] .

codexesPTR.name: Weapon Master's Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Your Weapon Mastery Skills have an additional Charge. Lucky Hit: Damaging an enemy with a Weapon Mastery Skill has up to a [40-60%] chance to Stun them for 2 seconds.

codexesPTR.name: Wildbolt Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Every [3.5-2] seconds, Distant enemies are Pulled in to you and take 10% increased damage for 3 seconds.

codexesPTR.name: Wind Striker Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Critical Strikes grant [8.5-19%] Movement Speed for 1 second, up to 6 seconds.

codexesPTR.name: Windlasher Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Casting Double Swing creates a Dust Devil that deals [X] damage to enemies in its path.

codexesPTR.name: Winter Touch Aspect
codexesPTR.description: When you Freeze an enemy, you deal [X] Cold damage to them. This effect is treated as a Frost Skill.

uniquesPTR.name: 100,000 Steps
secondary_stats: Evade Grants 10% Attack Speed for 3 Seconds
terciary_stats: Movement Speed per Walking Arsenal Bonus
terciary_stats__full: [5-7]% Movement Speed per Walking Arsenal Bonus
ga: 10.5% Movement Speed per Walking Arsenal Bonus
uniquesPTR.effect: When activating or refreshing the full Walking Arsenal Key Passive effect, you automatically cast Ground Stomp and gain [50-100] Fury. Can only occur once every 5 seconds.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "While many Barbarians remained in the Dreadlands, small groups from the Oxen, Crane and Bear tribes instead chose to search the land for a new home." - A History of the Children of Bul-Kathos

uniquesPTR.name: Ahavarion, Spear of Lycander
secondary_stats: 159.5% Critical Strike, Vulnerable, and Overpower Damage
terciary_stats: Lucky Hit: Up to a 15% Chance to Restore 66% Primary Resource
terciary_stats__full: Lucky Hit: Up to a 15% Chance to Restore 66% Primary Resource
ga: Lucky Hit: Up to a 15% Chance to Restore 99% Primary Resource
uniquesPTR.effect: Gain a random Shrine effect for 20 seconds after killing an Elite enemy. Can only occur once every 30 seconds.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "The angel Lycander left us a portion of her power in this spear. It is all the proof I need that she watches over us still." - Oracle Argoysni

uniquesPTR.name: Airidah's Inexorable Will
uniquesPTR.effect: When casting an Ultimate Skill and again 5 seconds after, you Pull in Distant enemies and deal [X] Physical damage to them. This damage is increased by x [10%] per 1 points of Willpower you have.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "When I was born, I breathed in the wind and the storm and they gave me life. When I die, I will breath out, and return that gift to the skies." - Journal excerpt

uniquesPTR.name: Ancients' Oath
uniquesPTR.effect: Steel Grasp launches 2 additional chains. Enemies hit by Steel Grasp take x [40-60%] increased damage from you for 5 seconds.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "Weapons wielded by the fiercest warriors often catch the eye of the Ancient spirits. If the wielder is worthy, the spirits may bless the steel with their strength." - Gerti, Oxen Tribe Forgemaster

uniquesPTR.name: Andariel's Visage
uniquesPTR.effect: Lucky Hit: Up to a 20% chance to trigger a poison nova that applies [X] Poisoning damage over 5 seconds to enemies in the area.
uniquesPTR.flavor: The horrific whispers of the Maiden of Anguish flicker through your mind, pushing you ever closer to madness...

uniquesPTR.name: Arreat's Bearing
terciary_stats: Call of the Ancients Cooldown Reduction
terciary_stats__full: [23.5-32.5]% Call of the Ancients Cooldown Reduction
ga: 48.8% Call of the Ancients Cooldown Reduction
uniquesPTR.effect:
Ancients you summon are empowered.
Korlic creates an Earthquake that deals [X] Physical damage over 4 seconds when he leaps.
Talic leaves behind Dust Devils that deal [X] damage while he whirlwinds.
Mawdac ignites the ground Burning enemies for an additional [X] damage over 4 seconds when he upheaves the ground.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "Rise clansmen and reclaim our trampled honor! Ancients' blood runs through us all! We are storms - earth breaking, maelstrom wielding. The fire of the gods burn still! They are with us!" - Ealda

uniquesPTR.name: Asheara's Khanjar
uniquesPTR.effect: Hits with this weapon increase your Attack Speed by [4-8%] for 4 seconds, up to [30-50%] .
uniquesPTR.flavor: When Caldeum's gates closed, Asheara led her Iron Wolves out of the city knowing full well they would never return. Instead they roamed Kehjistan pledging their blades to any who were in need.

uniquesPTR.name: Assassin's Stride
secondary_stats: Casting a Mobility Skill grants +100% Movement Speed for 2 seconds
uniquesPTR.effect: Mobility Skills are always Shadow Imbued with [60-120%] increased potency. Lucky Hit: Damaging an Elite or Boss with a Mobility Skill has up to a [40-80%] chance to instantly triggers a free Shadow Imbuement explosion.
uniquesPTR.flavor: The Viz-Jaq'taar descended on the mages indiscriminately and silently as a plague. The wise took flight, whilst the foolish fortified their dwellings as if walls or wards protected from shadow.

uniquesPTR.name: Axial Conduit
terciary_stats: Chance for Chain Lightning to Hit Twice
terciary_stats__full: [13.5-22.5]% Chance for Chain Lightning to Hit Twice
ga: 33.8% Chance for Chain Lightning to Hit Twice
uniquesPTR.effect:
Chain Lightning alternates between orbiting you and seeking up to 3 enemies. When it returns, it Consumes 6 Mana from you for each active Chain Lightning. After Consuming 66 total Mana, the bolt explodes for [X] Lightning Damage.

Chain Lightning expires if you don't have enough Mana for it to drain.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "Do not confuse your manipulation of lightning as control. The azure flame is its own master and needs no hand to wield it. You are merely a conduit for its chaos." -Ascribed to the mage Woh

uniquesPTR.name: Azurewrath
terciary_stats: Lucky Hit: Up to a 40% Chance to Deal [X] Cold Damage
terciary_stats__full: Lucky Hit: Up to a 40% Chance to Deal [1100-2700] Cold Damage
ga: Lucky Hit: Up to a 40% Chance to Deal 4050 Cold Damage
uniquesPTR.effect: Your Casts with this weapon apply Vulnerable for 3 seconds and Chill enemies for [10-30%] .
uniquesPTR.flavor: The ancient runeblade of the angel Izual, Azurewrath was miraculously spared the corruption that consumed its master.

uniquesPTR.name: Balazan's Maxtlatl
uniquesPTR.effect:
Each attack damages Close enemies for [100-150%] of your Thorns and deals 100% of this damage as Poisoning over 3 seconds.

Each time you've retaliated with Thorns, for 5 seconds the Poisoning damage is increased by 100%, up to 300%.

uniquesPTR.name: Band of First Breath
uniquesPTR.effect:
Casting Evade consumes 1 stack of Resolve to increase your damage dealt by [20-40%] for 5 seconds. 
Gain Armored Hide's Passive Effect.
uniquesPTR.flavor: A gentle whisper glides on the wind, words eluding mortal ken. It weaves through the soul like a melody forgotten, leaving naught but a name: Adarja, the First-Breather.

uniquesPTR.name: Bands of Ichorous Rose
terciary_stats: Chance for Poison Trap to Cast Twice
terciary_stats__full: [18.5-27.5]% Chance for Poison Trap to Cast Twice
ga: 41.3% Chance for Poison Trap to Cast Twice
uniquesPTR.effect:
Poison Trap always deals its full damage over 3 seconds and it benefits from all its upgrades, which are increased by x [50-150%] . 

Poison Trap also:
Benefits from Combo Points
Has no Cooldown during Inner Sight
Cooldown is reduced by Preparation

uniquesPTR.name: Bane of Ahjad-Den
uniquesPTR.effect: Every 6 seconds, your next Mighty Throw detonates its pulses instantly as Fire Damage and deals x [200-300%] increased damage.

uniquesPTR.name: Banished Lord's Talisman
uniquesPTR.effect: After you spend 275 of your Primary Resource, your next Core Skill is guaranteed to Overpower. Your Critical Strikes that Overpower deal [20-60%] increased damage.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "His name has been lost to history, but to have been exiled from a land as cursed as Hawezar, his deeds must have been truly depraved." - Scholar's Notes

uniquesPTR.name: Battle Trance
secondary_stats: Lucky Hit: Up to a 20% chance to gain a stack of Frenzy
uniquesPTR.effect: Increase Frenzy's maximum stacks by 2 . While at maximum stacks, you deal [30-60%] increased damage and your other Skills gain [35-55%] increased Attack Speed.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "The change that overtook my brother in battle was terrifying. His eyes turned hard like diamonds, and the way he moved... it was like he was dancing to music only he could hear." - Captain Dervin

uniquesPTR.name: Beastfall Boots
uniquesPTR.effect:
When you cast an Ultimate Skill, your next Core Skill Consumes up to 500 Energy, and deals [0.25-0.75%] increased damage per Energy Consumed.

Using a Cooldown restores 25 Energy.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "Genai grew proud and fond of boasting of her hunting prowess. She claimed she was fast enough to catch even the spirit Leraye, who cursed her for such an insult." - Fable of Genai's Twenty Trials

uniquesPTR.name: Black River
terciary_stats: Chance for Corpse Explosion to Deal Double Damage
terciary_stats__full: [36.5-50]% Chance for Corpse Explosion to Deal Double Damage
ga: 75% Chance for Corpse Explosion to Deal Double Damage
uniquesPTR.effect: Corpse Explosion consumes up to 4 additonal Corpses around the initial Corpse, gaining [120-160%] damage and [42-50%] Size per additional Corpse consumed.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "The scrolls describe a river of tar that separated the living from the land of the dead. Any unfortunate soul who tried to cross would be dragged down into oblivion." - Notes of Scholar Kamien

uniquesPTR.name: Blood Artisan's Cuirass
terciary_stats: Damage for 4 Seconds After Picking up a Blood Orb
terciary_stats__full: [103.5-135]% Damage for 4 Seconds After Picking Up a Blood Orb
ga: 202.5% Damage for 4 Seconds After Picking Up a Blood Orb
uniquesPTR.effect: When you pick up [10-3] Blood Orbs, a free Bone Spirit is spawned, dealing bonus damage based on your current Life percent.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "The infamous Necromancer Gaza-Thul's mastery over blood magic was indisputable. Many suspect that upon his death, his skin was used to fashion this eldritch armor." - Barrett's Book of Implements

uniquesPTR.name: Blood Moon Breeches
uniquesPTR.effect: Your Summoning Skills have a [3-7%] chance to randomly inflict Decrepify or Iron Maiden. You deal x [20-50%] increased Critical Strike Damage to enemies affected by your Curses.
uniquesPTR.flavor: A naturally occurring curiosity, the blood moon persists as a sign of woe for the most superstitious Zakarum faithful. Children born under it are often considered cursed and cast out, lest it spread.

uniquesPTR.name: Bloodless Scream
terciary_stats: Lucky Hit: Up to a 40% chance to deal X Shadow Damage
Lucky Hit: Up to a 15% Chance to Restore X Primary Resource
terciary_stats__full: Lucky Hit: Up to a 15% Chance to Restore [84.7-91.7]% Primary Resource
Lucky Hit: Up to a 40% chance to deal [8500-13500] Shadow Damage
ga: Lucky Hit: Up to a 15% Chance to Restore 137.5% Primary Resource
Lucky Hit: Up to a 40% chance to deal 20250 Shadow Damage
uniquesPTR.effect:
Your Darkness Skills Chill enemies for up to 100% and deal [100-200%] increased damage to Frozen enemies and Bosses.

Every 800 times you damage enemies with Darkness Skills, all Nearby enemies are Feared for 0.25 seconds before Freezing for 3 more seconds.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "My companion swung her odd weapon in a wide arc, and our pursuer stopped short. The look of horror on his face as his body fell to pieces will haunt me forever." - The Ebon Pages, Canto II, Verse XI

uniquesPTR.name: Blue Rose
terciary_stats: Chance for Ice Spikes to Explode Twice
terciary_stats__full: [26-35]% Chance for Ice Spikes to Explode Twice
ga: 52.5% Chance for Ice Spikes to Explode Twice
uniquesPTR.effect: Lucky Hit: Up to a 30% chance to form an exploding Ice Spike, dealing [X] Cold damage. Triple this chance if the enemy is Frozen.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "Her lover's spirit faded and in her sorrow she wept frozen tears. Where they fell, roses of the purest ice would blossom each winter." - Greenslade's Tales, Chapter 7: "The Myth of Irina Coldheart"

uniquesPTR.name: Chainscourged Mail
uniquesPTR.effect: Casting a damaging Brawling Skill disables it afterwards. When all of these Skills that are on your Action Bar are disabled, they become re-enabled with their Cooldowns refreshed. Your Brawling Skills deal x [50-100%] increased damage for each disabled Skill.

uniquesPTR.name: Condemnation
terciary_stats: Lucky Hit: Up to a [X%] Chance to Make Enemies Vulnerable for 2 Seconds
terciary_stats__full: Lucky Hit: Up to a [43.3-47.3]% Chance to Make Enemies Vulnerable for 2 Seconds
ga: Lucky Hit: Up to a 70.9% Chance to Make Enemies Vulnerable for 2 Seconds
uniquesPTR.effect: Your Core Skills deal x [50-70%] increased damage when spending 3 Combo Points. Casting Basic Skills always generate 3 Combo Points.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "I've never seen such ruthless butchery. He deserves to be be shipped off to die in the swamps with the rest of the godless murderers." - Witness to the murder of Sergeant Walcot

uniquesPTR.name: Cowl of the Nameless
uniquesPTR.effect: You gain [20-40%] increased Lucky Hit Chance against Crowd Controlled enemies.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "He is banished from the Guild, his name stricken from the Book. His punishment is to never have been." - Excerpt from a burned parchment

uniquesPTR.name: Craze of the Dead God
uniquesPTR.effect:
When you would take direct damage, it is instead distributed as Poisoning over the next 10 seconds but increased by [30-0%] .

Lucky Hit: Direct damage has up to a 25% chance based on your Poisoned Life percentage to infect an enemy with Touch of Death.
uniquesPTR.flavor: T'an seized a spear and drove it thrice into his mad brother Tan. Alas, the craftier of the twin gods wove one last cunning snare. In place of blood, the wound wept venom and consumed all in its wake.

uniquesPTR.name: Crown of Lucion
uniquesPTR.effect: Each time you use a Skill with a Resource Cost, gain x [5-15%] increased damage and Resource Cost is increased by +30% for 4 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.
uniquesPTR.flavor: The prince of Hatred, fair as maggots over carrion. He claims no throne, crafts no realms, reigning over only a blackened, bitter heart. Some legends name him banished, while others dread his return.

uniquesPTR.name: Cruor's Embrace
terciary_stats: Blood Surge Drains + [X] Times from Elites
terciary_stats__full: Blood Surge Drains [2-3] Times from Elites
ga: Blood Surge Drains 4 Times from Elites
uniquesPTR.effect: Casting Blood Surge consumes nearby Corpses to cause mini novas, dealing [X] damage. This damage is increased by x10% for each enemy drained by your initial cast, up to x50%, as well as by x20% for each Corpse consumed.
uniquesPTR.flavor: In the blood dancer's grasp, a victim lies, A vessel dried 'neath darkened skies. Their life extinguished, veins burst and drained, In Cruor's embrace, forever enchained.

uniquesPTR.name: Deathless Visage
terciary_stats: Chance for Bone Spear Projectiles to Cast Twice
terciary_stats__full: [23.5-32.5]% Chance for Bone Spear Projectiles to Cast Twice
ga: 48.8% Chance for Bone Spear Projectiles to Cast Twice
uniquesPTR.effect: Bone Spear deals x [40-60%] more Critical Strike Damage. Casting it forms echoes that deal x [20-40%] of its normal damage.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "Rathma is endless. He was the first Ancient, and will remain at the end. He is the master of the Great Cycle of Being. When Death comes for him, why should he fear it?" - Vauntus, Acolyte of Rathma

uniquesPTR.name: Deathmask of Nirmitruq
uniquesPTR.effect: You can now overexert yourself while Casting Flurry, spending 8% life when you don't have enough Energy. Spending life to Cast Flurry increases its damage by x [70-100%] and your Attack Speed by +50% for 5 seconds.

uniquesPTR.name: Death's Pavane
secondary_stats: +15% Dodge Chance while Channeling Dance of Knives
uniquesPTR.effect: Dance of Knives drops knives from enemies hit. Picking them up grants you 1 Charge and increases your Dance of Knives damage by x [10-20%] for 6 seconds, stacking up to 3 times.

uniquesPTR.name: Deathspeaker's Pendant
terciary_stats: +1 Essence per Enemy Drained by Blood Surge
terciary_stats__full: 1 Essence per Enemy Drained by Blood Surge
ga: 1 Essence per Enemy Drained by Blood Surge
uniquesPTR.effect: Blood Surge casts a mini nova on your Minions, dealing [X] damage. Damage is increased by 10% per target drained by the initial cast, up to 50%.
uniquesPTR.flavor: Once a sanctum for Rathma's studies, the Temple of the Deathspeaker became a proving grounds for potential leaders of his priesthood. Its halls are filled with the corpses of those who failed.

uniquesPTR.name: Dolmen Stone
terciary_stats: Movement Speed while Hurricane is Active
terciary_stats__full: [21-30]% Movement Speed while Hurricane is Active
ga: 45% Movement Speed while Hurricane is Active
uniquesPTR.effect: Casting Boulder while Hurricane is active will cause your boulders to rotate around you instead. Boulder's damage is increased by x [30-50%] for each one currently rotating. You may have up to 10 Boulders active at a time.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "As the hateful mob beat on his door, he gripped the pulsing shard tightly and screamed for calm. When he opened his eyes, all that greeted him was silence and the blood-smeared ruins of his cottage."

uniquesPTR.name: Doombringer
terciary_stats: Lucky Hit: Up to a 15% Chance to Heal for 530 Life
terciary_stats__full: Lucky Hit: Up to a 15% Chance to Heal 530 Life
ga: Lucky Hit: Up to a 15% Chance to Heal 795 Life
uniquesPTR.effect: Lucky Hit: Up to a 25% chance to deal [X] Shadow damage to surrounding enemies and reduce their damage dealt by 20% for 5 seconds.
uniquesPTR.flavor: Whenever this ancient sword has reappeared throughout history, it portends a time of great strife, as well as a devastating loss of life.

uniquesPTR.name: Eaglehorn
terciary_stats: Chance for Penetrating Shot Projectiles to Cast Twice
terciary_stats__full: [37-55]% Chance for Penetrating Shot Projectiles to Cast Twice
ga: 82.5% Chance for Penetrating Shot Projectiles to Cast Twice
uniquesPTR.effect: Penetrating Shot bounces off walls and deals x [110-150%] increased damage.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "Scholars have been unable to decipher the runes carved into this bow, however all agree they are related to its uncanny ability to bend arrows towards their targets." - Barrett's Book of Implements

uniquesPTR.name: Earthbreaker
terciary_stats: Chance for Landslide Projectiles to Cast Twice
terciary_stats__full: [16-25]% Chance for Landslide Projectiles to Cast Twice
ga: 37.5% Chance for Landslide Projectiles to Cast Twice
uniquesPTR.effect: Casts of Landslide leave behind Tectonic Spikes that deal [X] Physical damage over 2 seconds. Spawning a Landslide pillar within Tectonic Spikes has a [20-30%] chance to spawn two instead.
uniquesPTR.flavor: When Arreat was sundered, the world quaked. The Druid Aglainn journeyed far to chronicle the aftermath. Grief-stricken by the great mountain king's fall, he rent the earth anew.

uniquesPTR.name: Ebonpiercer
terciary_stats: Chance for Blight Projectiles to Cast Twice
terciary_stats__full: [16-25]% Chance for Blight Projectiles to Cast Twice
ga: 37.5% Chance for Blight Projectiles to Cast Twice
uniquesPTR.effect: Blight also shoots 4 smaller projectiles that pierce enemies and deal [X] Corrupting damage over 3 seconds.
uniquesPTR.flavor: This talisman was the life's work of Deathspeaker Jurdann. Following his premature demise, Jurdann's successor wore the amulet in tribute as they trialed against the Temple of the Deathspeaker.

uniquesPTR.name: Endurant Faith
uniquesPTR.effect: When you would be damaged for at least 40% of your Maximum Life at once, it is instead distributed over the next 3 seconds and reduced by x [10-30%] .
uniquesPTR.flavor: Despite the Light's blessings, countless Knights Penitent were hewn apart by the infernal hordes. Remnants of their steel lie scattered through the Hells  dwindling lights in the chaos.

uniquesPTR.name: Esadora's Overflowing Cameo
terciary_stats: Movement Speed for 4 Seconds After Picking Up Crackling Energy
terciary_stats__full: [16-25]% Movement Speed for 4 Seconds After Picking Up Crackling Energy
ga: 37.5% Movement Speed for 4 Seconds After Picking Up Crackling Energy
uniquesPTR.effect:
Crackling Energy now gains x10% damage for every level in Shock Skills you have equipped and enemies hit have a 2% chance to refund a charge. Upon reaching maximum Crackling Energy, you rapidly unleash all charges on the closest enemy to you dealing x [40-80%] increased damage. 
You cannot gain charges from hits while rapidly discharging.
uniquesPTR.flavor: The only thing more potent than Esadora's magic was her endless hatred of humanity. As she lay dying, the pale amulet around her neck drank in both.

uniquesPTR.name: Esu's Heirloom
secondary_stats: Evade Grants 125% Movement Speed for 3 Seconds
terciary_stats: Movement Speed for 4 Seconds After Killing an Elite
terciary_stats__full: [8-12.5]% Movement Speed for 7 Seconds After Killing an Elite
ga: 18.8% Movement Speed for 7 Seconds After Killing an Elite
uniquesPTR.effect: Your Critical Strike Chance is increased by [20-40%] of your Movement Speed bonus.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "While scholars have proven these boots were not created by Esu herself, it is noteworthy that they have been passed down since the formation of the Mage Clans." - Barrett's Book of Implements

uniquesPTR.name: Eyes in the Dark
uniquesPTR.effect: Death Trap deals x [40-60%] increased damage and will rearm itself after activating, once every 10 seconds.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "And so, when the sun dipped behind the hills each night, he knew that Ashen Jack would soon be near. Watching, and waiting." - Greenslade's Tales, Chapter 2: "Each Long Night"

uniquesPTR.name: Fields of Crimson
uniquesPTR.effect: While using this weapon, damaging at least one enemy with Rupture creates a blood pool that inflicts [X] Bleeding damage over 6 seconds. Enemies standing in the pool take x70% increased damage.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "We've been fighting these flesh-eaters for so long, been soaked in so much blood, that after a while it's difficult to tell what side you're truly on." - Daelyr, Crane Tribe warrior

uniquesPTR.name: Fists of Fate
terciary_stats: Lucky Hit: Up to a [X%] Chance to Make Enemies Vulnerable for 3 Seconds
terciary_stats__full: Lucky Hit: Up to a [1-51.8]% Chance to Make Enemies Vulnerable for 3 Seconds
ga: Lucky Hit: Up to a 77.7% Chance to Make Enemies Vulnerable for 3 Seconds
uniquesPTR.effect: Your attacks randomly deal 1% to [200-300%] of their normal damage.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "Will you let fear cheat you, or will you risk everything to find understanding? After all, death is simply the coin with which we purchase life." - Zurke

uniquesPTR.name: Flamescar
secondary_stats: Lucky Hit: Up to a 40% Chance to Deal 6000 Fire Damage
terciary_stats: [X%] Chance for Incinerate to Deal Double Damage
terciary_stats__full: [36.5-50]% Chance for Incinerate to Deal Double Damage
ga: 75% Chance for Incinerate to Deal Double Damage
uniquesPTR.effect: While Channeling Incinerate, you periodically shoot embers that are attracted to enemies, each dealing [X] Fire damage.
uniquesPTR.flavor: The burn may heal, but the pain is eternal.

uniquesPTR.name: Flameweaver
terciary_stats: Chance for Fire Bolt Projectiles to Cast Twice
terciary_stats__full: [13.5-22.5]% Chance for Fire Bolt Projectiles to Cast Twice
ga: 33.8% Chance for Fire Bolt Projectiles to Cast Twice
uniquesPTR.effect: Casting Fire Bolt through your Firewall causes it to split into 3 bolts, each dealing [30-100%] more damage.
uniquesPTR.flavor: Driven to surpass Esu, the wizard Naridan's reckless enchantments caused an inferno, devastating the ancient town of Cagrim. Only the gauntlets remained - a solemn warning to all who dare tame fire.

uniquesPTR.name: Fleshrender
uniquesPTR.effect: Defensive Skills deals [X] damage to Nearby Poisoned enemies, increased by x50% for every 100 Willpower you have.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "This weapon is a reminder of the unbridled savagery of our druidic ancestors, the wisdom of which I see more clearly with every day that passes." - Moreg, Druidic Scholar

uniquesPTR.name: Flickerstep
secondary_stats: Attacks Reduce Evade's Cooldown by 2.5 Seconds
uniquesPTR.effect: Each enemy you Evade through reduces your active Ultimate Cooldown by [2.0-4.0] seconds, up to 10 seconds.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "Considered a failure by their creator, it wasn't until the assassination of an "untouchable" Caldeum noble that these boots' true power was understood." - Barrett's Book of Implements

uniquesPTR.name: Fractured Winterglass
secondary_stats: Conjuration Cooldowns are Reduced by 0.3 Seconds when a Frozen Orb Explodes
terciary_stats: Chance for Frozen Orb Projectiles to Cast Twice
terciary_stats__full: [13-17.5]% Chance for Frozen Orb Projectiles to Cast Twice
ga: 26.2% Chance for Frozen Orb Projectiles to Cast Twice
uniquesPTR.effect: Frozen Orbs deal x [4-8%] more damage per active Summon and have a 65% chance to create a random Conjuration when Cast. Lucky Hit: Your Summons have up to a 90% chance to launch a Frozen Orb at a Nearby enemy.
uniquesPTR.flavor: Winterglass refracts light and also manipulates mana - forming complex arrays of spells and enchantments. These distinct characteristics posses great power, yet the outcomes remain unpredictable.

uniquesPTR.name: Frostburn
terciary_stats: Lucky Hit: Up to a 40% Chance to Deal [X] Fire Damage
Lucky Hit: Up to a 40% Chance to Deal [X] Cold Damage
terciary_stats__full: Lucky Hit: Up to a 40% Chance to Deal [900-2400] Fire Damage
Lucky Hit: Up to a 40% Chance to Deal [900-2400] Cold Damage
ga: Lucky Hit: Up to a 40% Chance to Deal 3600 Fire Damage
Lucky Hit: Up to a 40% Chance to Deal 3600 Cold Damage
uniquesPTR.effect: You deal x [15-35%] increased Fire Damage to Chilled enemies and x [15-35%] increased Cold Damage to Burning enemies.
uniquesPTR.flavor: A touch so frigid it stops the heart and chills the very soul.

uniquesPTR.name: Galvanic Azurite
uniquesPTR.effect: Lightning damage leaves enemies magnetized for 4 seconds, causing them to emit Crackling Energy, and increase all Lightning damage they take from you by x [40-60%] . If two magnetized enemies hit each other with Crackling Energy they pull each other together.

uniquesPTR.name: Gathlen's Birthright
secondary_stats: Anima of the Forest Grants 15% Attack Speed
terciary_stats: Movement Speed While in Human Form
terciary_stats__full: [24.5-30]% Movement Speed While in Human Form
ga: 45% Movement Speed While in Human Form
uniquesPTR.effect:
While in Human form, Critical Striking enemies with Nature Magic [300-150] times grants you Anima of the Forest for 15 seconds.

While infused with Anima of the Forest you gain the Perfect Storm and Earthen Might Key Passives.

uniquesPTR.name: Gloves of the Illuminator
uniquesPTR.effect: Fireball now bounces as it travels, exploding each time it hits the ground, but its explosion deals [70-100%] of normal damage.
uniquesPTR.flavor: After Inarius returned to Sanctuary, he sought a way back to the High Heavens. His first step was to reignite the religion he had abandoned millennia before: the Cathedral of Light.

uniquesPTR.name: Godslayer Crown
uniquesPTR.effect: When you Stun, Freeze, or Immobilize an Elite, you Pull In all Nearby enemies and deal [30-60%] increased damage to them for 3 seconds. Can only occur once every 12 seconds. Against Bosses, this effect triggers when dealing damage instead.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "The Sahptev faithful believe in a thousand and one gods. If it takes me as many lifetimes, I will find and kill them all." - Gaspar Stilbian, Veradani Outcast

uniquesPTR.name: Gohr's Devastating Grips
terciary_stats: Critical Strike Chance Against Close Enemies
terciary_stats__full: [13.5-22.5]% Critical Strike Chance Against Close Enemies
ga: 33.8% Critical Strike Chance Against Close Enemies
uniquesPTR.effect: Whirlwind explodes every 3 seconds as Fire damage dealing [300-600%] increased damage. Critical Strikes with Whirlwind reduce the time until the next explosion by 0.4 seconds down to 1 second.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "The brutish construction of these gloves belies the strength they bestow. Gohr was clearly no craftsman, but it would be foolish to ignore the triumph of his work." - Barrett's Book of Implements

uniquesPTR.name: Gospel of the Devotee
terciary_stats: Chance for Basic Skills to Deal Double Damage
terciary_stats__full: [13-17.5]% Chance for Basic Skills to Deal Double Damage
ga: 26.2% Chance for Basic Skills to Deal Double Damage
uniquesPTR.effect:
Your Basic Skills are empowered. Damaging an enemy with a Basic Skill causes them to take x [20-40%] increased damage from your other Basic Skills for 10 seconds.
Reap attacks 10% faster.
Decompose now spawns a Corpse every 0.5 seconds.
Hemorrhage triggers an additional burst on the initial target.
Bone Splinters pierce through enemies

uniquesPTR.name: Grasp of Shadow
secondary_stats: Shadow Clones Execute Injured Non-Elite Enemies
terciary_stats: Ranks to Marksman and Cutthroat Skills
uniquesPTR.effect: Casting a Marksman or Cutthroat Skill has a [40-80%] chance to summon a Shadow Clone that mimics the Skill.
uniquesPTR.flavor: Dark wisps creep hungrily across these gloves, like an assassin's blade seeking a life to steal on a moonless night.

uniquesPTR.name: Gravebloom
terciary_stats: Chance for Golem to Hit Twice
terciary_stats__full: [36.5-50]% Chance for Golem to Hit Twice
ga: 75 Chance for Golem to Hit Twice
uniquesPTR.effect: You raise 3 smaller Golems that each deal x [40-60%] of normal damage and gain +30% Attack Speed. Your Golems respawn 50% faster.

uniquesPTR.name: Greatstaff of the Crone
terciary_stats: Chance for Stormstrike to Hit Twice
terciary_stats__full: [47-65]% Chance for Storm Strike to Hit Twice
ga: 97.5% Chance for Storm Strike to Hit Twice
uniquesPTR.effect: Claw is now also a Storm Skill and also casts Storm Strike. Claw and Strom Strike deal x [100-250%] increased damage.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "She has existed in Scosglen since before Fiacla-Gar walked the land. Her purpose is a mystery to us all. However, approach her with deference; she may grant you her counsel." - Airidah, to Donan

uniquesPTR.name: Greaves of the Empty Tomb
secondary_stats: Evade Leaves Behind Desecrated Ground for 2 Seconds
terciary_stats: Chance for Sever to Deal Double Damage
terciary_stats__full: [30.9-44.4]% Chance for Sever to Deal Double Damage
ga: 66.6% Chance for Sever to Deal Double Damage
uniquesPTR.effect: Sever leaves behind Desecrated Ground that deals [X] Corrupting damage over 2 seconds.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "The massive door to my family's crypt, which had taken a dozen men to close, was thrown open. Had I known the horrors to come I never would have set foot inside!" -The Ebon Pages, Canto I, Verse VII

uniquesPTR.name: Hail of Verglas
uniquesPTR.effect: Ice Shards now spreads out with 2 additional shards. You deal x [1.5-2%] increased damage for each time Ice Shards damages an enemy for 5 seconds, up to x [75-100%] .

uniquesPTR.name: Harlequin Crest
uniquesPTR.effect: Gain 20% Damage Reduction. In addition, gain +4 Ranks to all Skills.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "This headdress was once worn by an assassin disguised as a court mage. Her treachery was unveiled, but not before she used its magic to curse the king's entire lineage." - The Fall of House Aston

uniquesPTR.name: Harmony of Ebewaka
uniquesPTR.effect:
According to your secondary Spirit Hall choice, your Skills are all additionally Jaguar, Eagle, Gorilla, or Centipede Skills.

Your Skills deal x [20-40]% increased damage per Spirit type they have.
uniquesPTR.flavor: Only Ebewaka has walked amid a dozen Guardians. In death, they waged war for his spirit, yet none prevailed. Thus, the Guardians shared dominion, granting Ebewaka to roam freely amid all their realms.

uniquesPTR.name: Heir of Perdition
uniquesPTR.effect: Succumb to hatred and earn Mother's Favor, increasing your damage dealt by x60%. Slaughter enemies to briefly steal Mother's Favor from surrounding allies.
uniquesPTR.flavor: Beware false prophets donned as sheep yet bearing the stench of wolves. Thou shalt know them by their fruits. For a tree of good cannot produce evil, nor thorns yield a harvest sweet and fair.

uniquesPTR.name: Hellhammer
uniquesPTR.effect: Upheaval deals x [75-150%] increased damage to Burning enemies, and also ignites the ground Burning enemies for an additional [X] damage over 4 seconds.
uniquesPTR.flavor: The demon prince Ikonoth slew hundreds of the Heavenly Host with this infernal hammer before falling to none other than the Archangel Imperius himself.

uniquesPTR.name: Hesha e Kesungi
uniquesPTR.effect: The Protector can be invoked at range and pulls inward with its smashes. Enemies in its area take x [30-50%] increased damage from your Gorilla Skills, doubled while they are Knocked Down or a Boss.

uniquesPTR.name: Hooves of the Mountain God
secondary_stats: Attacks Reduce Evades Cooldown by 2.5 Seconds
uniquesPTR.effect: Casting a Basic Skill while at Maximum Fury causes your Fury to increasingly Drain until you run out, during which your Basic skills now cleave dealing x [70-100%] increased damage.

uniquesPTR.name: Howl from Below
terciary_stats: Corpse Explosion Fears and Slows for [X] Seconds
terciary_stats__full: Corpse Explosion Fears and Slows for [0.4-0.6] Seconds
ga: Corpse Explosion Fears and Slows for 0.9 Seconds
uniquesPTR.effect: Instead of detonating immediately, Corpse Explosion summons a Volatile Skeleton that charges at a random enemy and explodes. Corpse Explosion's damage is increased by x [50-90%] .
uniquesPTR.flavor: "Can you not hear it? That endless scream from the cold earth beneath your feet!? They are down there, trapped, blind with rage! Waiting to drag us down into the sod!" - Ravings of Madman Gustav

uniquesPTR.name: Hunter's Zenith
uniquesPTR.effect: Every 30 seconds you spend in an animal form, your next Core Skill is guaranteed to Overpower and Critically Strike and deals x [30-60%] increased damage. Casting a Shapeshifting Skill reduces this timer by 1 second, or 2 seconds if you change to a new animal form.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "By fang, claw, spear, or sword - send the bastards back to the flames from which they crawled! Soak the peat with their blood! For Fiacla-Gar! For Scosglen!" - Nafain, during the Days of Ash

uniquesPTR.name: Iceheart Brais
uniquesPTR.effect: Enemies that die while Frozen, have a [21-40%] chance to unleash a Frost Nova.
uniquesPTR.flavor: The mad artisan saw his fingers turn black from frostbite as he worked the cloth, but refused to stay the needle and thread for even a moment.

uniquesPTR.name: Indira's Memory
uniquesPTR.effect: Bone Spear deals x [20-40%] additional damage and is a Blood Skill. Casting Bone Spear will launch another Bone Spear if it can consume a nearby Corpse and 5% of your Maximum Life.
uniquesPTR.flavor: The tears of Linarian turned bloody over Indira's torn body. Many days, unyielding, he poured his magic into sundered bone and rended sinew. Though the flesh did mend, his beloved did not rise...

uniquesPTR.name: Insatiable Fury
uniquesPTR.effect: Werebear form is now your true form, and you gain [2-5] Ranks to all Werebear Skills.
uniquesPTR.flavor: When the Days of Ash began, the great druid Nafain reminded his disciples that nothing, not even the loss of their humanity, was too great a sacrifice to protect Tr Dlra from Astaroth's flames.

uniquesPTR.name: Jacinth Shell
uniquesPTR.effect:
Spending Vigor Heals you for [5-10%] of your Maximum Life.

Every second, your active Cooldowns now drain 10% of your Maximum Life to reduce their durations by 2 seconds.
