terciary_stats: Chance for Charged Bolts Projectiles to Cast Twice
terciary_stats__full: [57-75]% Chance for Charged Bolts Projectiles to Cast Twice
ga: 112.5% Chance for Charged Bolts Projectiles to Cast Twice
uniquesPTR.effect: Charged Bolts attempts to seek enemies, lasts longer, and deals x [60-80%] increased damage for every second the bolt is alive for.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "Also known as the Greatstaff of the Old Religion, this powerful relic is one of only a small handful of Skatsimi artifacts that have survived to this day." - Barrett's Book of Implements

uniquesPTR.name: Starfall Coronet
uniquesPTR.effect:
Meteor's Mana cost is replaced with a [5-2.5] second Cooldown and 3 total Charges. 

Casting Meteor drops 3 additional Meteors around the target. Its Enchantment and Enhancement drop 1 additional Meteor instead.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "The elders say they saw a star falling from the sky many years ago. A sign from the heavens that the end times were nigh. A rallying cry to take up arms and protect Sanctuary!" - Crusader Hamilton

uniquesPTR.name: Stone of Vehemen
terciary_stats: Chance for Stone Burst to Cast Twice
terciary_stats__full: [21-30]% Chance for Stone Burst to Cast Twice
ga: 45% Chance for Stone Burst to Cast Twice
uniquesPTR.effect:
While Channeling Stone Burst and for 2 seconds afterwards, you gain 15% Damage Reduction.

Stone Burst's final explosion deals x [15-20%] increased damage, further increased by x [15-20%] for each size increase.
uniquesPTR.flavor: Long ago, the Stone Clan laid the foundations of Old Kurast. They shaped earthen marvels, but wars with the Vizjerei turned chisel into spear. Now the only stone they wield is when cast against foe.

uniquesPTR.name: Storm's Companion
terciary_stats: [X]% to the Pack Leader Spirit Boon's Lucky Hit Chance
terciary_stats__full: [62.5-85]% to the Pack Leader Spirit Boon's Lucky Hit Chance
ga: 127.5% to the Pack Leader Spirit Boon's Lucky Hit Chance
uniquesPTR.effect: Your Wolf Companions are infused with the power of the storm, dealing Lightning damage and gaining the Storm Howl ability.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "The storm's rage is my own, brother. I call, and the skies roar in reply." - Vasily, to Bul-Kathos

uniquesPTR.name: Strike of Stormhorn
secondary_stats: Chance for Ball Lightning Projectiles to Cast Twice is Now Chance to Cast a Super Ball Lightning
terciary_stats: Chance for Ball Lightning Projectiles to Cast Twice
terciary_stats__full: [13-17.5]% Chance for Ball Lightning Projectiles to Cast Twice
ga: 26.2% Chance for Ball Lightning Projectiles to Cast Twice
uniquesPTR.effect:
Ball Lightning splashes on impact dealing [260-300%] of its total damage instantly and Stunning enemies for 1 second if it reaches its Maximum Range.
Super Ball Lightnings are larger, deal x125% more damage, have a higher Lucky Hit Chance, and its Stun duration is increased to 3 seconds.
uniquesPTR.flavor: The height of the Moon Clan's power brought a beast that instilled dread upon Khanduras. More demon than Khazra, the one dubbed the Stormhorn left charred brands where cities once stood.

uniquesPTR.name: Sunbird's Gorget
uniquesPTR.effect:
Picking up a Storm Feather forms a firestorm around you for 8 seconds dealing [X] Fire damage every 0.5 seconds.

Every 5 additional Storm Feathers you pick up intensifies the firestorm, increasing its damage by x100% but not refreshing its duration. Storm Feathers are now Jaguar Skills, and the firestorm is an Eagle, Jaguar, and Storm Feather Skill.

uniquesPTR.name: Sunstained War-Crozier
terciary_stats: Chance for Potency Skills to Deal Double Damage
terciary_stats__full: [26-35]% Chance for Potency Skills to Deal Double Damage
ga: 52.5% Chance for Potency Skills to Deal Double Damage
uniquesPTR.effect: Your Focus Skills benefit from all their Upgrades, and they increase the damage of your Potency Skills by [15-25%] for 8 seconds, up to [150-250%] .

uniquesPTR.name: Tal Rasha's Iridescent Loop
uniquesPTR.effect: Casting a Pyromancy, Shock, or Frost Skill increases your damage by [10-20%] for 8 seconds, stacking once per Element. Casting again refreshes all bonuses if the previous skill was a different Element.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "Fool said he dug it out of the sands near Lut Gholein with a few other 'worthless trinkets'. I hid my delight at receiving such a treasure in exchange for a meager handful of coins." Rakhaan

uniquesPTR.name: Tassets of the Dawning Sky
uniquesPTR.effect: When you take damage from a Non-Physical damage type, you gain [8-15%] Maximum Resistance to that damage type for 6 seconds. Can only apply to one damage type at a time.
uniquesPTR.flavor: May the Light of Father Inarius shine down upon all weary travelers of this holy land. Turn your face toward his radiance and find your strength renewed. - Statue Inscription

uniquesPTR.name: Temerity
terciary_stats: Lucky Hit: Up to a 5% Chance to Heal [X] Life
terciary_stats__full: Lucky Hit: Up to a 15% Chance to Heal [209-298] Life
ga: Lucky Hit: Up to a 15% Chance to Heal 447 Life
uniquesPTR.effect: Effects that Heal you beyond 100% Life grant you a Barrier up to [40-100%] of your Maximum Life that lasts for 8 seconds. You may now drink your Healing Potion while at full Life.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "The revelation that master tailor Callas was in fact a witch only served to further fuel the desire for her uniquely enchanted legwraps." - Barrett's Book of Implements

uniquesPTR.name: Tempest Roar
uniquesPTR.effect: Lucky Hit: Storm Skills have up to a [15-35%] chance to grant 4 Spirit. Your base Storm Skills are now also Werewolf Skills.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "Listen, child, to the music of the storm. It has its own rhythm. Its own melody. Hear how beautifully it sings, and perhaps one day you will be able to join in its harmony." - Airidah

uniquesPTR.name: The Basilisk
terciary_stats: Critical Strike Chance Against Stunned Enemies
terciary_stats__full: [21-30]% Critical Strike Chance Against Stunned Enemies
ga: 45% Critical Strike Chance Against Stunned Enemies
uniquesPTR.effect: Petrify now deals x [300-900%] Physical Damage. Earth Skills Petrify Healthy enemies for 3 seconds.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "Well did she feed her children, and well did her children feed her." -Scosglen folktale

uniquesPTR.name: The Butcher's Cleaver
terciary_stats: Critical Strike Chance Against Feared Enemies
terciary_stats__full: [16-25]% Critical Strike Chance Against Feared Enemies
ga: 37.5% Critical Strike Chance Against Feared Enemies
uniquesPTR.effect: Lucky Hit: Critically Striking an enemy has up to a 100% chance to Fear and Slow them by [61-90%] for 4 seconds.
uniquesPTR.flavor: A nightmarish amalgam of blood, bone and steel, this axe is as horrific, and as deadly, as its creator.

uniquesPTR.name: The Grandfather
uniquesPTR.effect: Increases your Critical Strike Damage by x100%. The other properties of this weapon can roll higher than normal.
uniquesPTR.flavor: An unbroken lineage of unwavering strength.

uniquesPTR.name: The Hand of Naz
uniquesPTR.effect:
Sacrificing both Skeletal Warriors and Golems grants an additional Skeletal Mage for each Minion sacrificed.

When a Skeletal Mage attacks enemies 25 times without dying it upgrades to a Skeletal Arch-Mage.

Skeletal Arch-Mages teleport to safety when attacked and their attacks occasionally shatter on impact dealing [50-100%] increased damage to the target and up to 3 additional targets.

uniquesPTR.name: The Mortacrux
terciary_stats: Chance For Corpse Explosion to Deal Double Damage
Hewed Flesh also grants a Barrier for [X]% Maximum Life for 4 seconds
terciary_stats__full: [36.5-50]% Chance for Corpse Explosion to Deal Double Damage
Hewed Flesh Grants [8-10]% Maximum Life as Barrier for 4 Seconds
ga: 75% Chance for Corpse Explosion to Deal Double Damage
Hewed Flesh Grants 15% Maximum Life as Barrier for 4 Seconds
uniquesPTR.effect: When consuming a Corpse, there is a [20-40%] chance to also create a decaying Skeletal Simulacrum that seeks enemies but cannot attack. When it dies, it explodes for [X] Shadow damage. This effect is treated as a Macabre Skill.
uniquesPTR.flavor: One of a pair of twin daggers, forbidden from ever meeting. Nearby corpses shudder in its presence.

uniquesPTR.name: The Oculus
terciary_stats: [X%] Chance for Teleport to Deal Double Damage
terciary_stats__full: [36.5-50]% Chance for Teleport to Deal Double Damage
ga: 75% Chance for Teleport to Deal Double Damage
uniquesPTR.effect: Casting Teleport grants a stack of Galvanization, increasing its damage by x [30-50%] for 8 seconds. Becoming Injured Teleports you to a random location.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "The rhythm of the orb, which had pulsed steadily for five centuries, quickened as its owner took his final ragged breaths. It were as if some intelligence within reveled in the sight." - Master Eos

uniquesPTR.name: The Third Blade
uniquesPTR.effect: Your Weapon Mastery Skills are now also Core Skills that have 100% Cooldown Reduction but cost Fury, dealing [50-70%] of normal damage. Fury cost for all Weapon Mastery Skills are reduced by 5.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "Restraint, mercy, honor...these are shackles, forged by the weak and the conquered." -Hephasto, the Armorer

uniquesPTR.name: The Umbracrux
uniquesPTR.effect: Your Subterfuge Skills create an attackable Shade Totem for [3-8] seconds. Any damage it takes is replicated onto surrounding enemies at 20% effectiveness. You may only have 1 Shade Totem active at a time. This damage counts as a Trap Skill.
uniquesPTR.flavor: One of a pair of twin daggers, forbidden from ever meeting. Bitter voices whisper from the blade.

uniquesPTR.name: The Unmaker
terciary_stats: Chance for Soulrift to Deal Double Damage
terciary_stats__full: [21-29.6]% Chance for Soulrift to Deal Double Damage
ga: 44.4% Chance for Soulrift to Deal Double Damage
uniquesPTR.effect: Soulrift's duration is increased by 0.5 seconds for every 30 Essence you spend while it is active, up to 8 seconds. Soulrift deals [100-200%] of its Shadow damage per second to surrounding enemies for every 30 Essence you gain while it is active.

uniquesPTR.name: Tibault's Will
uniquesPTR.effect: You deal [10-20%] increased damage while Unstoppable and for 5 seconds after. When you become Unstoppable, gain 100 of your Primary Resource.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "The younger apprentices think wearing heavy plate in the swamps is foolish. They fail to understand that our armor is our legacy, and without it we are nothing." - Crusader Pembroke

uniquesPTR.name: Tuskhelm of Joritz the Mighty
uniquesPTR.effect: When you gain Berserking while already Berserk, you become more enraged granting x [35-50%] increased damage, 6 Fury per second, and 10% Cooldown Reduction.
uniquesPTR.flavor: As he fought with side by side with Raekor to liberate the labor camp, Joritz claimed this dented helm from a fallen foe. As his legend grew, its unique shape became synonymous with his great deeds.

uniquesPTR.name: Twin Strikes
terciary_stats: Chance for Double Swing to deal Double Damage
uniquesPTR.effect: After casting Double Swing 4 times, your Double Swing sweeps will continue to hit 2 additional times, each dealing [110-140%] increased damage for 3 seconds.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "When hitting it once doesn't kill it, hit it twice." - Bear Tribe Proverb

uniquesPTR.name: Tyrael's Might
uniquesPTR.effect: While at full Life, your Skills unleash a divine barrage dealing [X] damage.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "Thus Tyrael, a perfect aspect of Justice, came to be. None were more vehement against the forces of hell. All demonic entities learned to shudder at Justice's might." - The Books of Jarl, Volume I

uniquesPTR.name: Ugly Bastard Helm
terciary_stats: Wrath of the Berserker Cooldown Reduction
Lucky Hit: Up to a 40% Chance to Deal [X] Fire Damage
terciary_stats__full: [8-12.5]% Wrath of the Berserker Cooldown Reduction
Lucky Hit: Up to a 40% Chance to Deal [4250-6750] Fire Damage
ga: 18.8% Wrath of the Berserker Cooldown Reduction
Lucky Hit: Up to a 40% Chance to Deal 10125 Fire Damage
uniquesPTR.effect:
Casting Wrath of the Berserker causes you to explode, dealing [X] Fire damage. While Wrath of the Berserker is active, your direct damage dealt is converted into Fire.

You deal x [40-60%] increased Fire damage.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "Ah, Burning Hells. You look like one of Zolmog's inbred bastards." - Varyana

uniquesPTR.name: Unbroken Chain
uniquesPTR.effect: Casting Steel Grasp reduces Iron Maelstrom's Cooldown by [3.3-10] seconds. Enemies damaged by Iron Maelstrom deal [20-40%] less damage for 6 seconds.
uniquesPTR.flavor: After the warmaster Raekor freed her people, the Oxen tribe continued to wear their collars and chains to honor those who died in thralldom under the Samauren Empire.

uniquesPTR.name: Unsung Ascetic's Wraps
uniquesPTR.effect:
Lightning Storm gains 1 additional strike each times it grows.
Lightning Storm Critical Strikes cause lightning to strike twice, dealing [60-100%] increased damage.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "The storm caller returns, day after day, demanding to meet the Tree. He beats his chest and demonstrates his powers, refusing to believe that he will never be chosen." - Excerpt from Gulyas' Diary

uniquesPTR.name: Vasily's Prayer
uniquesPTR.effect: Your Earth Skills are now also Werebear Skills and Fortify you for [.2-.5%] of your Maximum Health.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "Roots from the Great Oak growing at the seaward statue of Vasily will, on rare occasions, be found twisted back upon themselves, suffused with ferocious magic." - Barrett's Book of Implements

uniquesPTR.name: Vox Omnium
uniquesPTR.effect: Casting a Core Skill additionally fires 2 instances of Fire Bolt, Frost Bolt, or Spark, matching the Elements of your last 2 non-Core Skill casts. These projectiles deal x [30-90%] increased damage.
uniquesPTR.flavor: Your incantations are echoed by a chorus of the damned. Wield their torment, their vengeance, their pain against the Hellborne that tortured them.

uniquesPTR.name: Waxing Gibbous
secondary_stats: +50% Chance for Shred to Deal Double Damage
terciary_stats: Blood Howl Grants Stealth for [X] Seconds
terciary_stats__full: Blood Howl Grants Stealth for [2.2-3] Seconds
ga: Blood Howl Grants Stealth for 4 Seconds
uniquesPTR.effect: Killing an enemy with Shred grants Stealth for 2 seconds. Breaking Stealth with an attack grants guaranteed Critical Strikes for [1-4] seconds.
uniquesPTR.flavor: The nights preceding the full moon are sometimes far more dangerous than the event itself. The frenzy has begun to rise, yet the night is just dark enough to obscure a hunter from their prey's sight.

uniquesPTR.name: Wildheart Hunger
secondary_stats: Attacks Reduce Evade's Cooldown by 1.5 Seconds
uniquesPTR.effect: Shapeshifting into a new animal form increases the value of your Bestial Rampage bonuses by + [2-5%] , up to + [20-50%] . This bonus decays by 0.5% per second.
uniquesPTR.flavor: Do not seek comfort in the shapes of the moon, beastwalker. Its pallid light awakens a yawning hunger. Call the beast, but do not tarry. Lest you never return to your own skin.

uniquesPTR.name: Windforce
terciary_stats: Chance for Barrage Projectiles to Cast Twice
terciary_stats__full: [37-55]% Chance for Barrage Projectiles to Cast Twice
ga: 82.5% Chance for Barrage Projectiles to Cast Twice
uniquesPTR.effect: Hits of Barrage have a [50-75%] chance to deal triple damage and Knock Down enemies.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "There have been numerous world-shaping conflicts throughout history. This bow has been found on the battlefield of every one, and always in the hands of the victors." - Barrett's Book of Implements

uniquesPTR.name: Word of Hakan
terciary_stats: Chance for Rain of Arrows to Deal Double Damage
terciary_stats__full: [16-25]% Chance for Rain of Arrows to Deal Double Damage
ga: 37.5% Chance for Rain of Arrows to Deal Double Damage
uniquesPTR.effect:
Your Rain of Arrows is always Imbued with all Imbuements at once and receives your Arrow Storm benefits.
 
Gain x [30-50%] increased damage to Distant enemies.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "Let the great gates of Caldeum be sealed. Let its proud walls stand fiercely defended. The rest of Kehjistan may suffer this plague, but my city, and my people, will not." - Proclamation of Hakan II

uniquesPTR.name: Wound Drinker
uniquesPTR.effect:
Every time you deal Thorns damage, you gain [1-7] Vigor.

Gain Toxic Skin's Passive Effect.
uniquesPTR.flavor: The inner curve of this band is lined with thorns that tear the skin whenever it is unbound.

uniquesPTR.name: Writhing Band of Trickery
uniquesPTR.effect: Your Subterfuge Skills create a Decoy Trap that Taunts and lures enemies, dealing [X] Corrupting damage over 6 seconds. This counts as a Trap Skill and only one Decoy Trap can be active at a time
uniquesPTR.flavor: The ring shifts and spins on your finger as the forces within desperately attempt to escape.

uniquesPTR.name: Wushe Nak Pa
secondary_stats: Attacks Reduce Ultimate Cooldown by 0.4 Seconds
terciary_stats__full: Casting Ultimate Skills Restores [40-52] Primary Resource
ga: Casting Ultimate Skills Restores 78 Primary Resource
uniquesPTR.effect:
Casting an Ultimate Skill grants or amplifies its matching Primary Spirit Hall Bonus with [200-300%] potency for 15 seconds.

Your Ultimate Skills each gain an additional Skill Type:
 The Seeker is a Focus Skill.
 The Hunter is a Mobility Skill.
 The Devourer is a Potency Skill.
 The Protector is a Defensive Skill.
uniquesPTR.flavor: "Fear not the limits of your flesh, Spiritborn!  As our ancestors said: wshe nak pa! Transcend your being!" - Maka

uniquesPTR.name: X'Fal's Corroded Signet
uniquesPTR.effect: Lucky Hit: Your damage over time effects have up to a 75% chance to erupt, dealing [X] damage of the same type to surrounding enemies.
uniquesPTR.flavor: Skulking in the shadows of the Realm of Destruction, the Scarred Baron plots the downfall of the mortal who banished him here.

uniquesPTR.name: Yen's Blessing
uniquesPTR.effect: Casting a Skill has a [40-60%] chance to cast a Non-Mobility, Non-Ultimate Skill that is currently on Cooldown. Can only occur once every 8 seconds.
uniquesPTR.flavor: These greaves are imbued with the divine blessing of Yen, the Veradani goddess of restoration. They bestow the wearer a revitalizing strength that enhances their own.
